pros flax seeds organic fiber pumpkin seeds taste br cons price br br yum i used to avoid granola cereals because they were hard to chew a friend visited brought a box of nature path pumpkin flax granola and forgot to take it when he left so i tried it i was hooked immediately not only was it tasty but it was not jaw breaking hard it was not mush either perfection br br the only problem with this cereal is the price for someone on a fixed income trying to eat right it is expensive it is hard to find it for less than box and that is just too much for me to spend on a small box of cereal i bought this bulk package from amazon when it was on a super sale but on accident i did not hit auto renew and the price went back up when it goes back down i will renew but until then it is other places that are cheaper these are fred meyer in bulk and trader joe box the best price is fred meyer br br make sure that you chew the cereal good the flax seeds are whole if they enter the body whole they exit whole as well and that means you get zero nutrient from them so chew it up br br it excellent with so delicious coconut milk a non dairy non soy drink i just use it for this cereal i have stomach problems and this combo is one of the few things during the day that does not ache me
Summary: excellent organic granola cereal for all

Text: my husband and i eat this cereal almost every day probably five out of seven and have it delivered via subscription for me personally it is a tad on the sweet side so i often add about one part generic rice krispies to about four parts granola and mix them in a large tupperware container that maintains the nice light but crispy texture

nature path makes some excellent cereals and this is definitely one of them i really enjoy it because it has great flavor a good crunch and is a very healthy food in fact this is my favorite cereal hands down i totally recommend buying the pack of a penny saved is a penny earned besides it is not like the cereal is going to go bad it will keep for months until you break the seal
Summary: this cereal is great nutritionally is really tasty and is a great buy

Text: best granola cereal i have ever eaten you do not have to soak it before eating lol
love this cereal but i buy a oz box at costco for and sometimes am offered it with a box coupon its too high here
definite an auto delivery item plus nature path is one of the companies have not been bought by large companies like silk has been bought by dean

i thought it might not be a great idea to buy meat through the mail but it turned out great i love gyros and thought why not order from amazon at least that would make me feel better about the whole idea my order was delivered in days it would have been but we had a storm and the driver could not get here it was fabulaously packed with ice packs that we could reuse the gyros taste great and are pretty conveniet it makes a great and easy lunch i will definatly order this again and again

i recieved the delivery quicker than i thought i would i was concerned with how the food item would be packaged the gyro slices were still frozen when i recieved them the gyro slices were delicious they taste better than most of the restaurants i frequent
Summary: qick delivery and tastes good too

Text: i love a good gyro i order this meat all the time and it never let us me down some good pita bread lettuce tomato and any other veggie you like will make a great lunch

a href http www amazon com gp product b lrijc gyro meat loaf approx lb a br finally i can enjoy gyros at home without going out with gasoline pushing five dollars a gallon it is nice to know that this gourmet food is just a few feet away in the ice box br now how about greek olives and feta cheese so we can have a nice greek salad with our gyro

we have bought this gyro meat several times it is good and since we do not have a greek deli for almost miles it is as good as we can get for now my problem is the shipping yes it has to go by next day air that is fine but we would buy or loafs if they would combine shipping but they do not it is loaf shipping i know it does not cost much more to send as it does other than that it is good meat br br note this is the sliced version it is sliced very thin too thin for my tastes but others love it i prefer to buy the load and carve thicker pieces br br either way it is good but we can only afford it for special occasions due to the price of shipping and the lack of combining shipping options they really need to add this item to prime program
Summary: the meat is very good but there is no break on shipping

Text: the pounds of sliced meat itself are contained in a single cardboard box no vacuum seal or even plastic wrap that box is placed in another box that is lined with styrofoam sides styrofoam peanuts and three frozen ice paks it was shipped fedex day that what the label says not overnight or next business day which begs the question what exactly did the in shipping charges for lbs of meat and minimal packing materials actually go towards i think i know and it was not shipping br br years ago grecian delight the brand on the box was sold in a local supermarket chain in gyro kit boxes each contained a pack of sliced gyro meat one pita and a small container of tzatziki sauce i loved them but i have not seen the kits in decades and was happy to find a way to once again stock the freezer with gyros in waiting br br the gyro meat itself which i have ordered before tastes just like gyro meat as i said i love gyros but there is no place nearby where i can drop in and enjoy one so i have ordered the product in the past but in this case i have ordered for the last time br br i ve gotten the individual lb vacuum packets before at a time and they have arrived frozen or nearly frozen not so this box the meat was not only thawed it was only slightly cool i am afraid i am going to be throwing it out too risky for shipping charges it should have arrived in perfect condition overnight i will not make this mistake again i cannot afford to
Summary: have ordered before but this shipment was unusable

Text: the meat has some flavor i feel it could have a little more and also the slices are very thin so they burn quick if you dont pay attention the cucumber sause from the same place is amazing though
Summary: not the best not the worst

Text: i love a great gyros platter but there are not many greek restaurants pizzarias where i live so i was excited to see this offered here the meat was still frozen when it arrived and the styrofoam lined shipping box can be reused ice packs and all i bought it pre sliced and the slices separate easily from each other in the box so you can keep it frozen and just use a little at a time my only complaint is that i like thicker slices but in terms of flavor well i challenge you to make it at home yourself and have it taste this good i have a feeling i will keep a box of this on hand from now on one note the box does not contain heating instructions i tried it in the broiler and over browned it i wish i had read the instructions here before that first attempt

forgot expedited delivery and it is hot here in the south but the meat was cool and still very good the cucumber sauce is a great addition i did not have any pita bread but this is still great on white dollar rolls sub rolls or wheat bread cannot wait to try it on pita bread tonight highly recommended
i have been researching the web to find some gyro strips and this is the most expensive so far maybe look elsewhere

let us face it if you have no willpower can t limit yourself to eating of a normal sized bag of microwave popcorn and hate to shop at your local store prime eligible point click to porch does not get better good price it is not homemade but it fills the craving what more can you ask for that has only calories
Summary: popcorn for the lazy who hate to shop

Text: i really like this product but have not seen it around for awhile i am glad amazon carries it it has the most buttery taste of all the calorie popcorns out there very little unpopped kernels perfect serving size bags

i love this popcorn i like popcorn very much but i usually eat too much of it i keep these bags at work for when i want a snack if i had the big bags i would eat the whole thing these are perfect it seems like you get a big pile of popcorn but know you still are okay with calories compared to a candy bar or even hershey kisses i have tried other calorie things and it is like you get some pitiful amount but the popcorn seems like a real treat br br i see it is currently out of stock and not available for subscribe and save i hope they get more because it is really the most tasty buttery flavored of the brands i have tried
Summary: amazon do not stop selling this

Text: great popcorn and a lot for calories tastes great just about every kernel pops and it is not too salty i will surely purchase this again and would recommend it for anyone who likes great popcorn and wants portion control too

pop secret is by far my favorite popcorn and i eat about bags a day i normally get the homestyle but is was always to dry when i ordered on line so i went to the butter thinking it would not be so dry no such luck when i buy from the grocery store it is much more flavorable and fresh and it does not cost that much more i checked the dates and the store vs online bulk was about months different on average which probably causes the difference even though they both are in the sale by date range with this said i am going to have to discontinue buying this product online unless something changes and i will really miss it coming straight to my door since i eat so much i waited for months of getting this product before posting because any company can have a bad batch of anything sorry i hope this changes in the future
Summary: cheaper price but popcorn older and stale

Text: these are smaller bags of popcorn that are equal to about half of a normal sized bag i would prefer the normal sized packs

we like pop secret calorie pop corn the taste is good takes about one and a half minutes to pop and there is about cups of popped corn pretty good snack and just calories good buy and price here on amazon
could have been more buttery but otherwise a great popcorn for calories it seemed to be larger than other calorie popcorn bags

excellent product great taste perfect portion br br only calories in a bag i microwave it for and it comes out perfect each time br br fills a medium tupperware bowl br br and it was an very good value only for boxes shipped only cents for each bag
Summary: excellent product great taste perfect portion

Text: our deployed troops love this treat as it reminds them of home a very popular connection from home during down times

ok lets start of by saying that my microwave is not very good for popcorn but in my local grocery store i can buy market pantry popcorn for for large bags and not all the pop corn kernels pop but very yummy and i went through boxes in less than a month but then we have this one pop secret and my first bags burnt and was not happy so i decided not to follow the instructions so i decided to put microwave at minutes and let it stop when it got to sec ok so it did not burnt it but due to me not placing it microwave on high it took a very long time to cook it and so anyway it began to pop and so i thought great at least no burnt popcorn and i was so excited and hungry to try it due to the ratings on this site i began to eat it and my first reaction was oh my good ness dry dry where is the butter its called butter pop corn so where is the butter did it get all dryed up in microwave

months later and i still have more box after giving away the other two boxes lol there is no taste in butter and although it is a reasonable price it is too simple no flavor and you can sometimes get burned popcorn even though the same timing worked for the same package and the same microwave so never leave your popcorn unattended
perfect bland of spices this is a wonderful curry powder and the quanity is generous it has lasted me a long time

i am not generally a fan of starbucks regular coffee or most coffee for that matter but this is delicious light and flavorful not grainy at all i only add skim milk and yet it is creamy and sweet i wish they made the blonde in decaf too

i was placed on a severly restricted sodium diet three years ago and one day at my local market happened upon this product it was like i finally had stepped back into the world of taste if you have ever read nutrition labels on soups you know a sodium restricted diet does not allow for the vast majority of them so now i can have a healthy organic warm bowl of comforting soup whenever i like and if i purchase it through amazon by the case shipping is free making it a lot less expensive then my local market give it a try

this soup is very very sweet they left out the salt but it is full of sugar there is grams of sugar per serving with two servings in a can too sweet for me also there is dairy butter in it so it is not vegan or for someone with dairy allergies

this would be a great soup if health valley lowered the sugar content at least in half or more the company took the health out of the valley with this soup when one buys a no salt soup they are doing so for health reasons if one is watching their salt intake they are also in most cases concerned about their sugar intake i buy health valley no salt soups because they are organic no or little salt and yes low in sugar grams of sugar is shameful they do a good job with their no salt soups except with their tomato soup fix it health valley use carrots as a sweetener give it some thought
this is awful so i got out the pots and pans and made a great no salt little sugar and no butter fat tomato soup using fresh tomatoes tastes much much better than this tomato soup

this is for the health valley tomato soup no salt added ounce cans pack of i purchased this specifically for a person with heart problems one of the problems with canned foods is too much sodium so the no salt added is a good feature another problem is cholesterol content the ad for this product states mg cholesterol which is a false statement apparently the supplier did not update the ad when health valley changed their recipe for their no salt tomato soup and is now adding cholesterol the cans i received have a new on the label which the can shown in the ad does not this is an honest mistake on the seller part but he should correct it and he should list the true contents
Summary: no salt soup ad says no cholesterol the facts are different

Text: my husband had a stroke and needed no salt products to keep his blood pressure down br health valley no salt soups are great they have low sodium and also taste great
Summary: health valley tomato soup no salt added

Text: i am on a low sodium diet and this still has plenty of taste without salt
this is not the product i received they changed the product it now has chunks of tomato in the soup this is not what i wanted
i love this soup i have right sided heart failure and need to watch my salt intake this soup is as close to tomato bisque by campbell as you can possibly get you need to try this
since i have to watch my sodium i have looked for a very low sodium soup for quite awhile campbell made one but no longer does if you had tried theirs this one is far tastier and better
hard to find at my local grocery and amazon has a deal on cans that come periodically throughout the year great idea

actually i cannot remember a time when i tasted anything so bad i really could not believe it was meant to be eaten cannot imagine anyone liking this it did give me a good example for my daughter why it is important for her to take her health seriously
Summary: grotesque maybe i got a bd can but ick

Text: this is a good alternative to pasta sauces if you are supposed to lower your salt intake spaghetti lasagna etc
Summary: nice pasta sauce for low salt

Text: my husband and i love this i usually caramelize walla walla sweet onions to mix in the cooked product we have also added sauteed zucchini and chopped fresh tomatoes i do not feel deprived being on a gluten free diet when i can indulge in this and no it is not mac and cheese and i do not believe it is meant to be

i bought say cheez on a whim i am vegan and usually only use road end products to fulfil my kraft kravings cravings it is definitely not like kraft nor road end but there is something distinctly cheese like about it and i found it to be delicious i added both peas and broccoli and was pleasantly suprised to find that the cheese sauce was plentiful enough for all of the pasta peas and broc i also must say as my first time trying to cook gluten free pasta on my own this was painless and did not crumble apart like it could have i gave it stars not quite perfect but definitely a great treat every once in awhile for those of us on a budget

this smelled so good it drew a crowd in my newly wheat free kitchen everyone liked it from it is not the creamy kraft mac and cheese but it has a great smell and flavor and we came back and bought more

my daughter has a severe allergy to dairy so we have tried a couple of products trying to get close to macaroni and cheese this was very easy to prepare and while there was not a creamy sauce the spice packet was very tasty my picky but food allergic year old as well as my husband and i really enjoyed this product i got online today specifically to order this product
Summary: not mac n cheese but very good

Text: i received this product for free and was quite excited to try it out i have a child who has a variety of food intolerances and namaste brand products have been a godsend to our family unfortunately this say cheez product is terrible and my child would not touch it normally this is not a problem when my child tries new foods but i could not even stomach it it is nothing like mac cheese the sauce is not even creamy very disappointing
Summary: definitely not mac cheese not even close

Text: after trying the namaste pizza crust i was blown away delicous possibly the best pizza crust i have ever had so i tried their cheez pasta thinking it would be great as well big surprise it was awful i could barely tolerate one bite of it i like one of the other reviewers will save the pasta but make my own cheese sauce the cheese sauce smelled and looked terrible do not waste your money on this product

a href http www amazon com gp product b lkxg w namaste foods gluten free say cheez pasta dish ounce bags pack of a br br my sons are die hard boxed mac n cheese addicts but i recently discovered that keeping one of them off of gluten and casein really helps him out he is hyperlexic i tried this not really expecting the kids to like it but it was a hit i was so in love with the aroma that i ate a serving myself something i do not usually do when i make boxed mac n cheese i still like my own recipe for vegan cheese sauce better but this will be great for a time pinch or for the babysitter to prepare not exactly like kraft or even annie or back to nature but delicious in its own right five stars
Summary: amazing delicous better than i expected

Text: my year old daughter has alot of food allergies two of them are gluten and milk this is as close to mac and cheese that we have found we both thought it was very good we added tuna to it we will definitly be buying more keep adding new products to your line

my son was recently diagnosed as having food sensitivities to wheat and especially to milk cheese not having mac and cheese his favorite food was especially hard we tried some other products but the general consensus was they tasted like cardboard when we tried this the whole family loved it it does not really taste like mac and cheese but tastes great non the less

love getting something new for my diet tried it plain then added cubed chicken and broccoli it was really good everything i have tried from namaste has been wonderful keep coming up with new things br elinor in kennewick wa a href http www amazon com gp product b lkxg w namaste foods gluten free say cheez pasta dish ounce bags pack of a

i really like this namaste foods say cheez gluten free vegan macaroni and cheese style dinner it is not kraft mac cheese but i like it a lot better than kraft it is zesty and peppery and it does taste like cheese br br i thought that the tablespoons of oil they say to mix the cheez sauce with was excessive i used one teaspoon of oil and cup of the cooking water i reserved from the pasta and let it simmer while stirring for a few minutes to thicken then i added the pasta and green beans that i cooked with the pasta it was really tasty the macaroni which was a nice texture and cooked up beautifully has ridges to hold the sauce do not over cook the pasta though it needs maybe or minutes br br it just way too expensive i really think namaste foods could make money and still price this much better to be affordable for the average person no need to price gouge people who have food sensitivities and parents who have children with celiac disease i know this type of product costs more to produce because of the need for a dedicated facility and the special ingredients but your prices are ridiculous br br most families are on a strict budget especially in these days of poor economy and job losses even on subscribe save this product was almost a bag come on namaste foods you do not understand the meaning of namaste if you charge such exorbitant prices

when we found out my daughter has celiac disease we were on the hunt for a reasonable mac cheese we tried everything we could fine this was one of the worst the cheese flavor was pretty bad i took one bite and had to spit it out my daughter did not like it either i am keeping a spreadsheet of items we tried so we do not waste our money on it again in the future the best mac cheese we found was annie rice pasta and cheese

this is a great product for those who need gluten dairy casein free foods br br of course it does not taste like real macaroni and cheese geez do you really think shelled hemp nuts and other things are going to give you a creamy cheesey texture or taste if you are looking for something to replicate annies gf mac and cheese which does contain dairy then you will search in vain you cannot get real cheese flavor from non cheese products br br however if you are realistic and are aware that non cheese stuff will not actually taste like cheese yet you want something similar to mac cheese then this is a great option we really like this mix it has a unique taste we tend to alternate this stuff with road end organics gf cheddar penne chreese a href http www amazon com gp product b fjyczs road end organics gf cheddar penne chreese oz pack of a the road end is closer to cheese but again those who want a real cheese flavor consistency will be sorely disappointed however for those of us who cannot have real cheese this stuff is great br br we mix in veggies with ours you know the ones that are little squares of carrots peas corn etc and i use hemp milk when mixing for a bit more substance and flavor also if you add a bit of trocomare a href http www amazon com gp product b ell fa a vogel trocomare organic spicy herb seasoning salt ounce canisters pack of a it makes a huge difference in flavor actually trocomare makes a huge difference in the flavor of everything we love it and use it on just about everything br br so for those who expect a real cheese flavor do not even bother and stick with real cheese or change your expectations br br for those who realize it will not taste like real cheese but who want something different and unique and gluten dairy casein free buy this it is great
Summary: unique different great gf alternative to mac cheese

Text: i thought this would be a good gluten free replacement for annie mac n cheese but this was not really macaroni and cheese the sauce was not smooth and was spicy not hot spicy but strong flavored spicy my kids were appalled by it and while my husband and i could eat it we did not really like it since i bought a case we threw away the rest of the spice packets and made our own cheese blend for the rest of the pasta i would suggest trying one bag from a local store first if you can otherwise be aware that you may just be buying expensive pasta with useless spice packets if your family does not like this unusual flavor

even though it does not taste exactly like regular mac n cheese it is a very tasty product my child who has many food allergies was extremely excited to be able to eat mac n cheese again it is very delicious we have made it many times it packs well in a thermos for lunch

suprisingly i love this pasta dish when it comes to vegan macaroni and cheez products some are delicious and others are totally not well at first i was not sure about this one but as soon as i looked at the ingredients list and recognized every item and seasoning i instantly became comfortable with the idea of this being edible turmeric onion powder garlic powder rice milk powder etc this may not be macaroni and cheez but namaste is a great tasting pasta meal so im glad i chose to try it because i love it and maybe you will too

i am about months in to my transition to becomming vegan every once in a while i think of something that i miss all week i was craving mac and cheese but since i stopped eating the meat and dairy my body has stopped knowing how to process those foods soooo i could not cheat and eat mac and cheese i was in the gluten free aisle at central market searching for pastas when i stumbled upon this i took it home and after about minutes of my husband picking on me i tried it out ooooh eeeeem gheeee was it incredible br i even stuffed some in my husband mouth he promptly requested more to which i replied absolutely not br i had to come on amazon and buy a whole set so going forward i am never without br seriously the best mac and cheese i have ever had

if you are looking for a good pasta alternative this one is great if you are looking for a mac cheese replacement keep looking we are celiacs who have caesin intollerance so our taste have changed over the years this is a very healthy yummy alternative for those living a minimally processed lifestyle it does not have a cheese taste we ate it mixed with broccoli my year old and his little buddy had child sized helpings they have not had much grain recently and demolished everything on their plates i added the little bit leftover to my evening salad for a different texture was still very tasty
Summary: my toddler and i love this

Text: i eat this all the time it is so good even though it says cheese it is actually dairy free but the taste is just superb

just tried this for the first time today to be honest it is been years since i have had a real mac and cheese from the box however i thought this was great i adjusted the ratio for the sauce using tablespoon of oil instead of tablespoons of water and adding heaping tablespoon of tofutti sour cream to powdered sauce mixture this worked great for me and made it seem much creamier than i had expected from other reviews i also kept out a little of the starchy pasta liquid before i drained it to help coat the pasta with the sauce added in some cooked chicken fresh tomato and parsley it was delicious i will definitely do this again

my year old is on the gfcf diet and is picky this is definitely not mac cheese but the flavor is similar and he gobbled it up he can have ghee because it is casein free i think that made a big difference in the flavor i am happy to have another thermos meal for his school lunches

the first time i tried this i thought it was beyond hideous i was expecting something that tasted vaguely like pasta with cheese sauce i had only recently developed a total dairy intolerance on top of the gluten problem so was having very bad experiences with cheez cheese subsitutes every one i have tried has been uniformly hideous so it is not like i had high hopes for this dish it is not even remotely cheese like or even cheez like and hoping for something that tastes within screaming distance of cheese messes up one expectations something awful however i found if i approach this dish after erasing all thoughts of cheesishness from my mind tastebuds it is quite good actually describing the taste is a bit of a challenge it got tons of flavor not hot spicy but turmeric onion garlic paprica butterish something maybe it is the hemp seed that gives it the indescribable yumminess i cannot begin to compare with anything i am familiar with whatever the heck it is i find myself madly craving it quite often br br as it comes out of the package it is not creamy at all though one can up the creaminess by adding whatever milk substitute you prefer i have also added fake cream cheese to it with decent creamy results br br still i wish they would get rid of the cheeselike claims call it something else it seems to me it would better prepare folks for liking it thus increasing the sales thus bringing down the price which is my main complaint with this all the namaste foods i really feel like too often those of us with real severe dietary restrictions who have no choice in a specialty diet as opposed to those who are going gluten free as a way of jumping on a fad bandwagon are being budgetarily scr er shafted by specialty food makers br br if anyone has been introduced to cincinnati chili as an adult without adequate prior preparation the shock experience of this pasta mix is something akin to that i grew up on cinci chili have a lifelong addiction but if you approach it expecting something like good ole texas chili with meat n tomato n beans your taste buds are in for one heckuva shock those with no preconceived notions frequently love the stuff but it is very very different from traditional chili having been concocted by greeks
Summary: great as long as you completely forget about cheese

Text: i bought this because i am vegan and not because the product is gluten free the only other vegan mac n cheese substitute i have found tried are the roads end products my husband is hard to please when it comes to vegan cheese and he hated the roads end stuff but loved this i do too it way better than roads end stuff it has a delicious flavor that is not at all spicy also much easier to mix up than the roads end br br not that expensive at all i will definitely be buying more love it br br btw the people adding tuna and chicken are missing the point of eating a vegan meal
these beans are a good find as none of our local stores carry any dried pink beans
this was a great sampler of green coffee to roast i have not tried them all yet but i liked the variety of regions and it really was a great product for a great price

i have purchased green coffee beans from several local and internet providers often with poor results u roast em is the exception i have never had bad service with this company and now purchase all of my coffee from them they provide an excellent selection of high quality beans at great prices they do a great job with packaging and shipping most of my orders have shipped the same day i ordered br br i have tried most of their coffees and have yet to be disappointed if you are looking for a good mid priced coffee i would recommend la minita tarrazu de costa rica br br i highly recommend you check out u roast em for all your coffee needs

Text: i love these snacks great variety of flavors all mixed into one bag i also send them to our troops in afghanistan and iraq and they ship so much better than chips

let me tell you right now if you love these dont order them in bulk i fell in love with them when i first tried them from the vending machine at work and for a small tiny packet at i was like forget this ill get mine from amazon and stock up which i did they arrived in excellent condition they were tasty crunchy not expired unlike some other food items from here i was completely satisfied with the shipping and handling and condition and taste of item br br now i am sick of gardetto cuz i had too much too soon but they definitely are very yummy my colleague love them too br br

Text: my son has missed peppermint patties for over a year these honey mints are fabulous and he loves them too br allergy free goodness
Summary: gluten dairy corn soy free bliss

Text: modeled after york peppermint patties these mints are a perfect match of chocolate and sweet the honey filling is a bit thinner and sweeter than most mints this style but you can tell all the ingredients are natural the thin layer of gooey honey complements the unsweetened chocolate beautifully i highly recommend this tasty treat

i am well was a york pep patty addict but after reading the ingredients sugar semisweet chocolate chocolate sugar lactose cocoa cocoa butter milk fat soy lecithin and pgpr emulsifiers and vanillin artificial flavor corn syrup invert sugar egg whites and oil of peppermint i realized i did not want to eat corn syrup which i avoid and why is it now in there when years ago it wasn t i mean the first ingredient is sugar then there is pgpr i believe a preservative that also was never an ingredient years ago soy which is an allergen to many as well as eggs br br ok enough of that rant br br i have been trying to find a substitute and you can see a review of another honey mint i recently tried i was not totally thrilled br br so yesterday while at my health food store i bought one honey acre mint and gave it a try and wow so yummy the filling is creamy and the chocolate a velvet consistency and the mint well minty had i known i would have bought more than br br sooooo i just ordered a box of these and they will be my official peppermint patty addiction o
i tried these because a friend had allergies i don t but i am hooked the honey goes down smoother than the sugar in regular mint patties these mints are yummy
Summary: awesome mints even for those without allergies

Text: i got these from a local bee keeping specialty store in sacramento they are so good i came online to see if i can get them for less highly recommended for fellow food allergy sufferers

just rec d these yesterday and not only was the shipping super speedy but the candy was extremely fresh will order from again without hesitation

i found these in california and i remembered them when i was a kid they dontsell them in florida br where i live so i bought them on amazon and whenever my children visist me of i go west i load up on them br nothing better

Text: this is my first experience with antioxidant rich white tea also i like the fair trade and organic labels since i prefer mild teas the subtle honey like sweetness and floral fruity notes of white rose tea are immediately pleasing a stronger brew intensifies the rose flavor but the tea remains smooth without bitter tannins often found in green and black teas the white tea and rose blend is exquisite a wonderful soothing treat by itself or with dessert br br this has become my favorite tea

br white rose velvet garden white tea is an exciting and unusual premium numi tea it is a white tea more rare than other types of teas and less processed as well having been only plucked and dried not oxidized some people find white tea a subtler and more enjoyable type of tea experience i know i do white rose velvet garden white tea is certified organic and is both fair trade and kosher br br it is made from hand wrapped white tea leaves and rosebuds rosebuds can you imagine those are the only two ingredients and they are delicate and delicious different from anything else i have ever tried this amazon page erroneously lists some other ingredients but these are absolutely not in this tea it is made from only white tea and roses br br this tea like all numi teas is packaged with post consumer waste and the tea bags are made from biodegradable filter paper numi does not believe in the practice of adding oils or flavorings to bolster flavors and i love this and can tell the difference for this and many other reasons numi is one of my favorite tea manufacturers br br on the box numi writes roses have been a symbol of love and beauty since the dawn of romance numi enchanting velvet garden tm releases a provocative sweet rosy taste as it blushes a soft pink with every sip this liaison of organic rose petals and delicate spring white tea imparts a silken smoothness white tea is the tender bud of the tea plant making it exquisitely subtle and supremely healthy high in antioxidants and vitamin c this uplifting fair trade certified white tea blend will be the beginning of a long lasting love affair i have to agree this is truly an amazing tea br br if you like numi teas get it you will not be sorry if you are new to numi but love white tea or are curious to try it from the description i do not think you could find a better source than numi if you are looking for a romantic tea white rose velvet garden white tea fits the bill perfectly br br highly recommended br

if you want a mild cup of tea that still has a decent aroma and flavor this will do the trick wonderful for drinking with biscuits and other mild cookies or cake wonderful when you just want something that feels like you are pampering yourself good for a steambath facial too i steeped one bag five minutes by accident but it still was delicate

i first tried this tea when it came in a numi sampler set that my daughter brought me for christmas i tried it and fell in love with it only problem is that no store in the area carried that tea so i ended up buying it online at amazon and the price was fair tea is amazing

i bought fireworks wisconsin white birch popcorn oz seeking the perfect popcorn for my whirleypop popper but i wrecked the batches simply by cooking them too hot now i have discovered on my own how to do it right br br if you want perfect popcorn here is my secret br add ounces of oil in popper kernels br on electric stove yeah i know set burner between and on scale of to if you set it for you will have small lousy and even unpopped results who knew br when the kernels pop add cup of kernels any more than this and they will spill over br meanwhile melt to of one cube of butter in microwave for seconds br when popped turn the whirley handle to prevent popped corn from overheating or shake your pot the one on the stove if you lack this popper and pour into your favorite bowl don t put butter into your popcorn cooker drizzling butter and sprinkling a smidgen of salt br br the very best you have ever had true br br another tip i deliberately make extra putting the rest into a foodsaver airtight canister it stays genuinely fresh throughout the week br br p s i am just a happy customer i do not sell popcorn but now i eat too much of it
Summary: absolutely perfect just do not heat at too high a temperature

Text: the good news very easy to make tasty good noodles a few veggies br br the bad news mg of sodium about half your daily allowance yikes br br notes calories mg cholesterol g fiber g sugar g protein g fat g saturated fat br br these noodles are tasty the broth is ok there are a few veggies sprinkled on top pour in boiling water wait minutes or longer and you are done a good quick hot lunch when you are in a hurry but do not eat too often as the sodium content is incredibly high and would not be good for you ok once in awhile though unless you are on a sodium restricted diet in which case why are you even reading this far br br tip you can probably reduce the sodium content by pouring off the liquid after preparing and eating just the noodles and veggies or add your own healthier liquid broth even if you wish br br also you can let this sit for minutes of even longer and it will be good and still very hot
Summary: good noodles but incredibly high sodium content

it is all it is cracked up to be i will be ordering more when i run out the product came in the mail on time and in good condition

Text: i love quinoa for its delicious taste texture and nutritional benefits this now brand as sold on amazon is a great bargain i do a lot of research before i purchase items and feel satisfied that this is a good deal there is no need to soak this quinoa the bag tells you to rinse it before using but i never have and we love the taste quinoa can be used in a variety of ways but one of our favorites is to make quinoa pilaf the same way you would make rice pilaf simply chop onions carrots and celery and saute in olive oil then add the quinoa and substitute chicken broth for the water and cook as per directions quinoa is a great substitute for rice in general this brand provides consistent results always cooking evenly br br tip when i open a bag and use a bit i store the rest in a glass mason jar to keep it fresh that way it is easy to scoop out what you need and stores beautifully in the pantry cabinet

i consider myself a fanatical quinoa connoisseur having enjoyed many varieties over several decades now foods organic quinoa is by far the best quinoa i have ever purchased first the quinoa seeds themselves are thoroughly pre rinsed there is no acrid flavor whatsoever there is no impurity in this product it is quinoa i do not know what now has done differently but this quinoa cooks more evenly than any other quinoa i mean the seeds all cook about the same not mushy not too sticky it is about cents per lb more than the cheapest quinoa but remember that it is organic while the other quinoa is not i highly recommend this quinoa

this grain is an excellent substitute for rice it only takes two cans of chicken broth to one package of quinoa to make a lot of very tasty and filling finished product which can be used with gravy sauce mixed vegetables or anything you like
this quinoa has to be rinsed i would not have ordered it if i had known that there are many other brands for the same price that dont require this annoying and messy step

Text: i absolutely love this delicious drink i usually have it iced and top it with whipped cream so refreshing and such a treat br br its so easy to make and tastes like a choclatey mocha thick shake we all love it and recommend this highly have also used their smoothie mix also excellent
i ordered soozies doozies soft rich cookie gift tin for my daughter for easter br she loved them because they were fresh and made with all natural ingridients br i would purchase them again

i love amy because you can actually pronounce all the ingredients she uses no chemicals no preservatives nothing you need a chemistry degree to decipher and she makes pretty tasty food normally i am not a big fan of canned soups but the alphabet soup is an exception it is a rich tomatoey broth with a few vegetables and pasta alphabets i like soup without a lot of clutter so to speak my sole complaint is that the alphabet noodles are a bit mushy but then what do you expect in a canned soup still if you are looking for something to warm you on a chilly or rainy day amy fat free alphabet soup fits the bill

as i am writing this review i am sitting here at my computer wolfing down the food because i am starving br br i heated product in a saucepan over high heat for minutes until boiling base tastes like regular tomato soup better than campbell tomato soup i would say there are vegetables mixed in corn green beans and carrots green beans and carrots basically turn to mush in my mouth and i can barely taste them corn is not mushy but does not taste sweet i suspect this has something to do with being canned in a tomato base alphabet noodles have a nice texture smooth and not too mushy br br i love this soup very satisfying for something that is fat free will re purchase many times i am sure this would also make excellent kids food

i will start off by saying i have yet to purchase this on amazon but i have purchased this at health food stores so i can not say how it will arrive to you but i cant tell you about the taste br amy organic has consistently done a great job of creating delicious vegan vegetarian organic food this soup has a very similar taste to certain canned pasta product it totally brought me back to my childhood it is extremely delicious low in fat and calories it is a quick and healthy alternative to the old stand bys we are used to whether to give your child a better lunch or a trip down memory lane for yourself please give this soup a chance

i am pregnant and lately have been craving foods from my childhood like peanut butter sandwiches barbecue chips apple juice i have been in a soup mood lately and bought a bunch of amy soups at whole foods this soup is light and delicious and tastes like spaghetti o of course it is more soup like and healthier but that is what this reminded me of
my kids love this soup and i love having a few on hand it is a reliable meal with some toast and cheese i often add tofu to it to bump up the protein and they never notice

this is my year old son absolute favorite soup that he takes to school almost every day despite my attempts to broaden his taste buds he continues to insist that he wants this red soup every day with crackers my husband and i have also tried it and it is quite delicious like all amy products you can feel good about giving your child this soup the ingredients are all organic and tasty i have offered my son campbell soups in a pinch when i have run out of the amy alphabet soup but he really does not care for them if you read the label on campbell soup you will realize that they are loaded with junk br br amy soups cost a bit more than traditional canned soup but i think the extra cost is justified in higher quality ingredients and delicious taste

Text: if you have recently been on a lower carb eating plan such as the new york body plan a href http www amazon com gp product b fl fd the ultimate new york body plan just weeks to a total transformation a and found you really feel better eating less starches than you had in the past finding healthier carb choices to add back to your diet can be a challenge i really am grateful kashi makes this bar it has g of carb g pro g fiber g fat mostly from nuts and seeds it is fairly balanced has no artificial ingredients or sugar alcohols and really hits the spot i have tried all the kashi varieties and this remains my favorite my mother agrees if you are looking for a sweeter treat this is not the kashi for you however my brother thinks they taste like cardboard in any rate the amazon price is still higher than the grocery store price i am hoping it will drop soon

Text: nutiva organic hemp seeds are so good for you they are protein omega and gla i think the msrp on these bags is each so amazon has these priced at almost half price this is a great affordable way to get some healthy proteins and fats br br amazon sent me very fresh product i subscribed n saved on july nd and it arrived via ontrac on july th the nutiva hempseed package says it was packed on may and is best before may pretty fresh product and tastes fresh too br br sprinkle on top of your cereal omelets yogurt soups salads and veggies br br hemp seeds require no advance soaking to derive optimal nutritional benefit br br here is a great way to enjoy hemp br cup hemp seeds br cup spring water br tbsp maple syrup honey stevia or your favorite sweetneer br dash himalyan salt br optional flavoriing cinnamon nutmeg vanilla cardamom br br combine all in a blender and blend well until a creamy white milk forms pour through a strainer to remove any husk residue will keep in refrigerator for days but i recommend preparing small batches right when you want to drink them as fresh is the most tasty and most nutritious you could also make a great milk out of a href http www amazon com gp product b qp t cinnamon red maca almond butter a
Summary: way to go amazon with this amazing price

Text: these are yummy i eat them right out of the bag i throw them into baked goods cereals etc i mix them into my kid pb sandwiches too to add an even extra boost of nutrition to their lunch my children need extra calories nutrition i have not found there to be too many hulls either i will order these again

Text: i cannot sleep past am anymore because of this food one of my cats sits on my face attempting to suffocate me into consciousness cats are not very good at biology while the other kneads every bare spot of flesh he can find with his claws of love until i get up if i stop in the bathroom between stumbling out of bed and into the kitchen i am treated to a rousing refrain of mrow mrow scratch yowl outside of the door and that is if they do not follow me into the bathroom and circle around my legs like they are caught in my gravitational pull all the while insisting can opening is a far better use of my thumbs than anything else br br the only cons really and they are cute cons so i let it slide br br suffice it to say my cats love this stuff they eat it rocket around the house for minutes like they have just done some meth oh the power of organic ingredients then collapse in the sunspot on my vacated bed and sleep until i get home from work br br cat win i think so

Text: i have a pretty finicky feline i was a little nervous about trying something new but it was recommended to me it has been a huge hit i do not feed canned food daily and now she really wants it daily she absolutely loves it it is a great price and a great food

oddly i have given the cats turkey spinach in the oz size and they seemed to like it i bought cases of this oz and they only touch it after realizing that i will not give them more food br br it may be because i gave them turkey seafood for a while in between it is odd because they scarf up that flavor and they would scarf up the turkey spinach in the oz size weird br br i rate it stars for the ingredients and quality i always feed them castor pollux however as always test not only the flavor but also the size of the can when i scoop the food out of the can the consistency in the oz cans seems somewhat thicker than the oz in all flavors i have tried this may be a contributing factor to their distaste for this particular combination br br great product just verify kitty flavor approval

Text: i generally consider keebler products to be definitely designed for children and not appealing to adult sensibilities i bought these on chance because i love mint flavored products and they were on sale i fully expected to find them gagging and that i would have to give them away br br surprisingly they are not bad i would not buy them again since there are so many similar products which are better but they have good points each bar is large not as big as a candy bar but close each bar is individually wrapped which i thought was overkill for a box of cookies but that makes it easy to throw one into a lunch box or purse note that you only get six cookies in the whole box the cookies are surprisingly light and crispy definitely sweet but not overly so unlike many other keebler products the mint flavor is fresh and not wimpy and the chocolate flavor is mild but still pleasant the flavors overall are well balanced with emphasis on the mint as it should be br br i m not sure if these are designed for children or adults they seem much too large to be meant for children and i am not sure if kids would enjoy this combination of flavors in this configuration
Summary: surprisingly good if still keebler level

Text: blue diamond almonds whole natural ounce packages pack of i buy these nuts every time amazon has them they are very good for you and much less expensive then the grocery store when you figure per bag price i pay here i have a heart condition and need all the good protein i can get these are a good source for this it is only natural fat and no added salt i wish i could get them even at a bigger savings with the savings by subscribe and save br br my husband carries these in his pocket as a mid day snack and i have my daily dose that my md orders they taste very good once you get used to eating no salt or added oils br br i highly recommend i hope this helps

i first bought the small calorie pack box in my local store they are a wonderful source of protein without the carbs salt and extra sugar that come with other snacks or with roasted nuts e g especially honey roasted nuts br br these whole raw almonds are great for anyone with a blood sugar issue the raw almonds will not make your blood sugar spike are handy if your blood sugar has dropped and you need a quick source of food and the ounce bags are sturdy and will not rip or have not yet in my overly packed and oft mangled bag br br as the previous reviewer mentioned once you start eating these you will not miss the added fat and salt of any distributor roasted nuts since eating these natural almonds i have not missed the traditional roasted nut taste i grew up on the usual nuts but now i find i really look forward to this new clean taste for all these reasons i recommend blue diamond raw almonds br br however if you still think that these almonds are not crunchy enough for you especially if you bought the canned nuts you could always roast them yourself put the raw almonds on a cookie sheet you may want to line your sheet with foil or parchment paper in a pre heated oven at degree f stir them a few times to ensure they do not scorch i would check around minutes especially if your oven is a bit temperamental like mine and stir and check again before minutes because it is amazing how fast nuts can go from almost done to scorched or worse burnt roasting them yourself still has to be much healthier than any nuts that are cooked in oil remember also if you do roast the raw almonds in the oven please cool them completely and then refrigerate them afterward
Summary: excellent source of protein especially when you are away from home

Text: i am completely satisfied with this purchase of individual packs of almond nuts have ate about bags by now and everyone is delicious with no bad nuts cannot think of anything bad with the whole deal the bag sizes are perfect for an in between meal snack and are are really healthy for you

when i was told by my nutritionist that eating a handful of whole natural almonds a day would help me to lose weight and get the right kind of fats and proteins implemented into my diet i was a bit skeptical i was not a huge almond fan to begin with i do not particularly enjoy salted or roasted almonds usually only the kind that come surrounded with coconut and chocolate or the kind that you get out of the nut bowl to shell around the holidays the whole natural almonds by blue diamond taste like they came right out of the shell and boy are they yummy br br i like that they are a satisfying snack and i like the taste of them these are the ones i buy no added salt or anything nice and fresh right out of the shell br br stars
Summary: tasty and healthy good for dieting

Text: for years i used a href http www amazon com gp product b hjbkmq senoret chemical terro liquid ant baits bx a it worked extremely well within hours all ants were gone however my latest infestation was not responding to terro in fact they were eating the liquid up but it was not killing the ants my neighborhood hardware supply store told me that insects could become tolerant to certain pesticides i found the safer product but was skeptical take off the spout cover and blast a fine white powder into the cracks or places where the ants are coming through for me it was under two long baseboards in the kitchen then i swept up the excess white powder into the cracks some more and cleaned the tile of any powder it worked instantly any ants that even touched the powder immediately started to wiggle and die i have a cat so i cleaned any excess up carefully so she cannot get any on her paws as it is very toxic it is as good as boric acid br br this powder claims to kills ants cockroaches earwigs silverfish crickets millipedes and centipedes i did notice that immediately after applying this product silverfish started to appear evidently sensing the chemicals soon they will be gone do check it out i am so glad to be rid of those ants they even got into my freezer where i had chocolate

i love this gravy mix much easier and less fat than making from scratch and not as salty as mccormick or other brands br br i use non fat milk instead of water to make a cream gravy this is good stuff and by time you order this set of and other items there is no shipping and no tax the price is much less than i could get when on sale at my local supermarket

Text: is this hot chocolate yes br is this good hot chocolate um sorta br is this gourmet hot chocolate not a chance br br in my opinion the only advantage you get but using the green mountain k cups of hot chocolate is the simplicity of using your keurig machine to heat the water instead of using the microwave or stove top other than that the finished product is comparable to any swiss miss or other brand of powdered instant cocoa it actually may be worse if you use the largest setting on your machine the largest setting makes it much too watery br br green mountain needs to go back to the drawing board on this br br stars because it does make hot chocolate in your keurig without having to dirty dishes and tear open pouches but if you are looking for good hot chocolate keep shopping

it is indeed a rich and creamy chocolaty delight if you use the smallest cup size on your machine remember to shake the box well before using some cocoa still remains in the k cup after brewing but regardless you get a very satisfying cup of hot cocoa

i have never had any hot chocolate that tastes better than this not homemade not from starbucks not from swissmiss this is hands down the best i have ever had i go through so much of this stuff because whenever friends come over they go straight for it br br but what happened to the price most k cups run from about but amazon has these things going for even bed bath beyond has them cheaper than that bring the price back down to something reasonable and your star review will return

Text: my cat loves this first time i have found a cat food that he will eat and every time i go in the kitchen he thinks br its time to eat

what self respecting cat is not a picky eater i have never met any my cat likes whiskas choice cut foods mainly for the gravy and sometimes for the meat omar the magnificent and wonderful likes both the beef in gravy or tuna truth be told his dry crunchie is really his go to choice but he is that way with all prepared moist foods if you ask him his true five star preference is meat caught fresh in the garden let us skip the details you do not want to know let us just say that omar m w is on the job br br i personally prefer whiskas foods in pouches because omar is ok with allowing any remaining food to be left in pouch when stored in fridge rather than having to transfer it from a can to a glass container come on you all have cats that expect you to do this pouches are easy to dispose of too just rinse and trash you are not messing with storing smelling cans and trips to the recycling center

Text: every day is thanksgiving at sophie and sam dinner mat when they receive their whiskas turkey and giblets in gravy they are quick to devour it and clean each other right after eating i know they hope to pick up a piece hidden in the fur i only buy from amazon because of their awesome prices

both my cats love whiskas in any flavor my female cat sophie is usually the one that takes little bits until it is gone when she hears me tearing the whiskas pouches she flys into the kitchen and waits patiently for her food she never lifts her head up from the bowl until every piece is gone she will then sit by her brother samson to get more food if he leaves after he gulps his food down and see his sissy waiting for some of his he will tease her by taking one piece of his food out with his paw look at her and when she trys to take it away he puts his paw on it and scoops it into his mouth i can always count on empty bowls when i buy whiskas the price at amazon is more reasonable than the grocery store

our beloved bengal kitty isabel is years old and suffering from kidney stones which are inoperable in felines for years she lived on dry food but began to shun it as her health declined our vet ultimately advised feeding her whatever she would eat she might as well be as happy as possible in her declining years br br so we offered her one soft food after another she turned up her nose at the expensive vet sold brands and repeatedly rejected one national brand and flavor after another finally to her gustatory delight and our great relief she made her choice this particular wiskas version is the only kind she will eat day in and day out it must be whiskas with the turkey and giblets in gravy the gravy seems to add a certain flavor and texture she cannot resist br br we surmise that like humans our pets have food preferences linked to palate pleasing aroma and taste this whiskas is the one that rings the bell for our izzy no it is not the best choice for managing kidney stones but she is got to eat so you will not worry that we are ignoring her renal problems she is on daily medication and is doing quite well br br it not an inexpensive cat food but its packaging is very convenient and space saving the amazon auto ship program is a life saver the cartons always arrive on time and the per package bulk rate is lower than the price of small quanities also our local target was the only place we could find this exact variety and now the store no longer carries it remember our cat demands giblets and gravy and accepts no substitutes br br give autoship a try the price is better and you can easily adjust the quantity and frequency of shipment or cancel altogether
Summary: tasty food for a picky cat

Text: i started buying skippy several years ago after reading a number of consumer reviews that gave it a top ranking the one that stuck with me the most was a polling of year olds who gave skippy peanut butter a resounding recommendation for its tastes and texture in writing this review i went back and checked to see what more adult reviewers think i am taking the liberty of quoting from the cookinglightly website so far as its review of creamy br br the roasted peanuts on the ingredient list are evident in the heady aroma and balanced flavor testers thought this sample was a touch oily but spread the best makes the perfect peanut butter sandwich but can turn into a savory dressing when mixed with soy vinegar and crushed red pepper to serve over sugar snap peas broccoli or a stir fry for a sweet version mix with honey and mayonnaise and use as a fruit salad dressing mix with chile paste with garlic sambal oelek or sriracha for an easy sauce for roast meats br br this is my opinion too and while the above review was for the regular creamy it applies in my opinion to the reduced fat version just as well i love this peanut butter i know that jif and peter pan are also often ranked highly but skippy is by far my preference br br while i use it on sandwiches i often just eat a tablespoon or two as a quick snack and source of protein it is so good in this role that i gave it to a diabetic friend she uses it in lieu of orange juice if she is starting to feel hypoglycemic the peanut butter stays with her longer and has a smoother effect br br i will note that some nutritionists are now raising questions abou he value of reduced fat peanut butter they have two asic points br br the process of removing fat is n fact removing monounsaturated oils which are healthy for us br br to compensate for any loss of taste manufacturers are putting back in sugars and oils which may not e so healthy br br my rating is based on taste and texture i am not taking a position in nutritional debates but do suggest that you check these matters out separately if you are concerned about this kind of issue
Summary: top of the line so far as reduced fat peanut butters

diamond almonds br almonds are a good source of magnesium one ounce contain approximately of the rda for an adult recommended dietary allowance rda br recommended dietary allowance rda the amounts of selected nutrients considered adequate to meet the known nutrient needs of healthy people the rda is based on scientific knowledge and has been presented by a committee of the food and nutrition board fnb of the national academy of sciences nas the canadian equivalent is the recommended nutrient intakes rda is generally accepted throughout the world as a valid source of information at least different nations have as well as organizations have published standards similar to the rda br br magnesium is the fourth most abundant mineral in the body and is essential to good health approximately of total body magnesium is found in bone the other half is found predominantly inside cells of body tissues and organs only of magnesium is found in blood but the body works very hard to keep blood levels of magnesium constant br magnesium is needed for more than biochemical reactions in the body it helps maintain normal muscle and nerve function keeps heart rhythm steady supports a healthy immune system and keeps bones strong magnesium also helps regulate blood sugar levels promotes normal blood pressure and is known to be involved in energy metabolism and protein synthesis there is an increased interest in the role of magnesium in preventing and managing disorders such as hypertension cardiovascular disease and diabetes dietary magnesium is absorbed in the small intestines are you taking enough magnesium in the diet the recommended daily allowance is mgs day for men mgs for women magnesium is extremely safe by mouth too much simply causes diarrhea try increasing the amount of magnesium you take by mouth until it causes diarrhea then reduce the dose slightly so it does not this is called taking magnesium to bowel tolerance just like using vitamin c to bowel tolerance br br almonds are a good source of fiber br one ounce contains approximately of the rda for an adult br so in summary almonds are a very healthy snack so what is left to say br br Text: after trying every kind of almond out there over the years i will take these flavorful blue diamond almonds any day they are fresh salted just right and not greasy oily i try to eat a handful a day usually as a mid afternoon snack for optimum health benefits the handy container is easy to use and even indicates portion size unfortunately this type of almonds is getting more and more difficult to find in my local stores so i was happy to be able to order a pack from amazon to have in my pantry

these are our absolute favorite almonds and love that there is not any fake sugars in them i will take more calories with real sweeteners any day over sucralose in the other brands and this flavor is delicious yum

i ordered these lovely almonds a few weeks ago as i often find myself jonesing for junk food and i thought that if i had something that was good for me around i would be less likely to grab something terrible these nuts are packed with nutrition and they taste amazing they have just enough flavor to make me want more but the fact that they are high in fat makes it difficult to eat too many in one sitting i am satiated with two handfuls i go through one little container every week or so they are perfect for anyone concerned with nutrition or trying to put on or keep muscle they pack grams of protein in oz i will definitely be re purchasing these nuts i was not so keen on the idea of the canisters as i do not like producing so much waste but i have purchased nuts peanuts etc in the past in bulk and they did go bad before i finished eating them br these nuts have kept me out of the icecream chocolate chips and other naughty sweet things that have little nutritional content these nuts taste like they should be bad for you but they are more similar to vitamins than junk food read the back for the nutritional content vitamin e phosphorus magnesium manganese the list goes on br br update i ordered my second shipment of these i love these and i eat a handful of these almonds after my morning banana yogurt shake and with my vitamins

diamond almonds br almonds are a good source of magnesium one ounce contain approximately of the rda for an adult recommended dietary allowance rda br recommended dietary allowance rda the amounts of selected nutrients considered adequate to meet the known nutrient needs of healthy people the rda is based on scientific knowledge and has been presented by a committee of the food and nutrition board fnb of the national academy of sciences nas the canadian equivalent is the recommended nutrient intakes rda is generally accepted throughout the world as a valid source of information at least different nations have as well as organizations have published standards similar to the rda br br magnesium is the fourth most abundant mineral in the body and is essential to good health approximately of total body magnesium is found in bone the other half is found predominantly inside cells of body tissues and organs only of magnesium is found in blood but the body works very hard to keep blood levels of magnesium constant br magnesium is needed for more than biochemical reactions in the body it helps maintain normal muscle and nerve function keeps heart rhythm steady supports a healthy immune system and keeps bones strong magnesium also helps regulate blood sugar levels promotes normal blood pressure and is known to be involved in energy metabolism and protein synthesis there is an increased interest in the role of magnesium in preventing and managing disorders such as hypertension cardiovascular disease and diabetes dietary magnesium is absorbed in the small intestines are you taking enough magnesium in the diet the recommended daily allowance is mgs day for men mgs for women magnesium is extremely safe by mouth too much simply causes diarrhea try increasing the amount of magnesium you take by mouth until it causes diarrhea then reduce the dose slightly so it does not this is called taking magnesium to bowel tolerance just like using vitamin c to bowel tolerance br br almonds are a good source of fiber br one ounce contains approximately of the rda for an adult br so in summary almonds are a very healthy snack so what is left to say br br two things br st be cautious about bowel tolerance or happy bowels if you prefer br nd taste i realize that taste is a personal thing that is why they make chocolate strawberry and vanilla br br here my current favorites br br st blue diamond dark mint dark chocolate reminds me of the chocolate mint girl scout cookies with less sugar br br nd blue diamond dark chocolate oven roasted br rd blue diamond blue butter toffee br thd blue diamond almonds bold habanero bbq reminds me of bbq potato chips again with less sugar br th bold blazin buffalo wing br th blue diamond almonds cinnamon brown sugar br th blue diamond almonds lime n chili br th blue diamond almonds smokehouse br th bold wasabi soy sauce br br but that is just me you might have a completely different take on these flavors br th and th are very close br br gunner br may

Text: these are a good thing for you and sometimes hard to find in a larger container at the store so these make it much easier and there a good price here

these are incredible eating these makes me not want to eat candy i love these the price is not that great though i think blue diamond should save money by packaging them in something cheaper than plastic i did notice it on amazon in a box but the price looks odd over too bad amazon does not stock this so no free shipping

the almonds tastes all right since it is too dry the salt can hardly stay on surface therefore it is not salty enough on the whole it is a healthy snack i hope this type of almonds can have subscription service and discount

i have tried several of the blue diamond jar almonds and the butter toffee almonds are the best they would probably be my favorite almond but they are high carb i guess the trick is to only eat a few at a time we can all do that right br br i agree with the other reviewer who said that the blue diamond almonds in the cans are better than the ones in the jars my favorite are the vinegar salt but the butter toffee almonds are the exception
Summary: butter toffee almonds are sooo good but hi carb

Text: it seems impossible that there is a healthy snack that tastes like cinnamon brown sugar but they have managed to do it i love these and i always have my cabinet stocked this quenches my sweet tooth without gulit i highly recommend it
Summary: satisfies my sweet tooth in a healthy way

Text: do buy the almonds great for snacks and travel the contanier has a close top which is great for storage
great flavor i snack on these when i need a boost of energy they help satisfy cravings between meals

i must say these almonds have made me a lover of nuts i have always been a cashew girl and never cared that much for almonds well being on a low carb diet made cashews a no no almonds roasted only with sea salt are soooo good blue diamond makes the best tasting and these are hard to find in stores i love the lb bag of these but cannot seem to find them buying these in bulk was the best deal out there and i will have to purchase again thanks blue diamond for a superior nut
this almond product is wonderful i am so excited to have healthy options that curb my sweet tooth it has on sugars for an ounce of almonds br br wahoo
these almonds taste good not as well flavored as the cinnamon or vanilla flavored but a decent change of pace a little plain though
i love these almonds wish they sold them somewhere locally so i did not have to buy them in bulk over the internet
if you are an almond fan like me and like sweets as well this is a great treat and healthy as well

these almonds are fantastic i cannot find them locally so i am glad amazon sells them comes to under bucks a bottle the only thing better a href http www amazon com gp product b zsv blue diamond natural oven roasted almonds vanilla bean ounce jars pack of a
compared to what i pay at the normal grocery store for almonds these are priced great and taste fresh and crunchy the sea salt taste is perfect and the containers are conviently sized

this is an excellent product i tried a handful that a friend had and i was hooked it has good flavor without being too salty you can also chop them and add to salads or in green beans my kids enjoy them also good alternative to junk snacks

i love sea salt and i love almonds this snack is so good i had to keep reminding myself that this is a healthy snack unbelievable br br almonds have a lot of health benefits one benefit in addition to all the others is heart health br br this snack is perfect for anytime you want a snack but do not need anything unhealthy
love these very flavorful and wholesome i am hooked unlike the heavily oiled salted roasted almonds found in most grocery stores these actually taste like real food
these gave me a headache too much sugar and other ingredients that did not sit well i would not recommend to someone trying to eat healthier
Summary: too much sugar big time headache

Text: great taste almonds are high in overall fat but low in saturated fats that most contribute to weight gain buy a case they stay pretty fresh when sealed for months

so the hottest hot off the press recommendation is an ounce of almonds a day will help keep the doctor away and for good reason they are full of b and other vitamins fiber not cholesterol not sodium not empty calories and not tasteless wallpaper paste br br but these these new blue diamond almonds i ve so far tried both the brown sugar cinnamon and the vanilla are soooooo good that it is hard to stop at an ounce this has become my after dinner treat br br to help fight the sodium bugaboo they have instead coated them with a velvet dairy whey based powder take note lactose intolerant folks that is loaded with flavor they are not sweet except the sweetness of the lactose and they are not the least bit salty they taste like a great dessert in both flavor and texture br br thumbs way up licking my fingers kind of up
