Text: this is absolutely the best coffee in america anyone who makes the effort to try this coffee will be addicted i am a huge proponent of french press coffee and this stuff is by far the best that way it is beyond belief in drip as well try it and you will see what i mean
we have been trying different coffee through amazon and by far this is the best it has a wonderful taste definitely ordering this again

my girlfriend can rarely have caffeine because of her heart but she cannot help but always have a little cup when i make a pot of weavers organic blend the french roast is worth a try but i must say my absolute favorite is the organic blend its taste is unchallenged by others

its not that this coffee sucks its that it does not begin to measure up to all the hoopla br its well balanced but thats about it br even a little old tasting nothing special in the least br what sweet caramel finish br can t believe this is the same coffee the star reviews are about

woooowwww the organic blend is probably the best thing i have ever tasted when i opened the bag and the aroma filled the room everyone just freaked out br i would say the organic blend is the best and not just because nbc today show said so

hmmm where to start it is a really really good cup of coffee it definitely deserves stars no doubt happy to drink it would be proud to serve it to my guests perhaps best called caramel finish not sweet caramel finish might need a little turbinado sugar to get the sweet part br br i do not think it is better than the cafe altura dark roast columbian sold by amazon in oz bags i would consider them equals but the weaver is not better and you get more coffe for less money with the cafe altura br br i m sure being called the best organic coffee on the nbc today show was a good shot in the arm for sales but i sincerely doubt that they are the new standard in artisan coffee i think of coffee like italian restaurants in new york new jersey the great ones have endured and everybody knows where to go for great italian food but when everybody is making the same stuff really well what you are left with is your personal preference weaver is lucky to have some devoted coffee drinkers but they are not a new standard by any stretch of the imagination way too many people growing roasting great coffee for that
Summary: it is good stuff but do not believe the hype

Text: this tea is an excellent herbal tea love the taste and it is not as weak as most herbal tea is i used to get it from the commissary on base but they stopped stocking it so i checked on amazon most wanted to sell by the case but anneeavon sold them in single packages and i swear it said and free shipping when ordered from this seller above the add to cart button i ordered last night and opened my e mail this afternoon to find they charged me shipping for each of the boxes i ordered and the estimated arrival time is a week away for that kind of money i would expect overnight for that kind of money i could have gotten a couple cases and had change it is probably my fault for miss reading something but just be aware of the shipping charges on anneeavon products
Summary: buy this somewhere else not from anneeavon

Text: it is not an amazing tea it is an okay tea i buy regular green tea at asia market for way cheaper price and i get same result i look for saving money will not repurchase
great product at a awesome price i have been drinking this product from early may and the health benefit are great

my dogs have been enjoying these treats for years and we have ordered this many times from amazon in the past however our last order was a big disappointment the description of exactly how much of this product you will receive is very unclear so when i saw that the product weight is lbs and the shipping weight is lbs naturally i expected to receive a minimum of three one pound bags as we have in the past not so amazon outrageously charged us for a single one pound bag of dried lamb lungs you would think i was buying caviar the treats were promptly packed back up and returned tsk tsk tsk amazon br br so stars for the product itself stars for amazon this time

i ordered the merrick lamb lung treats on the advice of a dog agility friend who had great success with them my dog has been blowing her contacts in agility trials and my friend suggested using these special treats only when training the dog walk a frame table and see saw after just two training sessions my dog is once again racing to the contacts and sticking them my fingers are crossed that this behavior will carry over to the trials but with the help of a clicker and these apparently very appealing treats i am seeing renewed confidence and enthusiasm they are expensive but are a bargain compared to the wasted trial entry fees and travel costs i am also going to use them as i begin very basic obedience training with our new rescue dog

best treats for anysize dog no matter how large or small we give these to our local humane society as well they dont have the option of purchasing such hi quality treats our pounder herding dog loves them and the small dogs think they are steaks nearly jump ft for a piece dry and greasless and break easily can put directlly into pocket without concerns of residue transfer my favorite and the dogs too
i am the aunt to dogs and they visit me for sleepovers i always try to have treats they like and this was no exception they kept coming back for more
dogs love them they are the perfect treat to put in the kennel with them when i have to leave

these treats are the best for training whether its obedience or agility they were recommended to me from my dog trainer after learning she used them while conducting obedience training with my pups they can easily break down into smaller bite size pieces which is great for constantly rewarding good behavior without overindulging or making them chew during training they are also great treats to be used as a small snack for your dog i highly recommend them my dogs will listen to anything i say when i have these in my hand
Summary: amazing treats for obedience training and snacks

Text: my two dachshunds are nuts about these lamb lung treats and i must say that overall they are my favorite dog treats too because a one pound bag lasts a very long time and therefore is very economical the pieces are easy to break up into any size you need for training they are a natural lamb a href http www amazon com gp product b n ekk merrick lamb texas hold ems lb bag a product with a genuine aroma of roast lamb the dogs never get tired of them you can carry pieces in your pocket and they will not stink or fall apart but the dogs sure know they are there for my dogs they are the most motivating commercial treat i have found what is not to like
my large corgi mix loves these they are great as treats and or crumbled and mixed in with his food found these to be much cheaper than at my local store

i have been giving these to my dogs for the past couple of years they love them even though it is a bit pricey the bag lasts a long time we have dogs spoiled dogs they get these treats as rewards for good behavior or really for just anything this bag lasts a couple of weeks merrick is an excellent company the dogs love them and really what else matters this was an excellent price will be ready to buy more soon
Summary: lamb treats the only treats for my dogs

Text: most dogs love these but our dog was less than pleased he is a tad persnickety it is a good product with few calories great for training purposes
the merrick lamb filet squares are the best treat i have found for my dogs all of my dogs love them they are hard to find on the shelf as they are so popular they are often sold out at the stores

been looking for a treat for my rottie that she would like but would also help her reudce her out of control milkbone habit and be less caloric these fit the bill well my only complaint is that they sometimes arrive pretty broken up into small pieces however avoid purchasng from white dog bone very slow and poor customer service the provider seems to vary with amazon br br update tip from my vet frozen cauliflower has the crunchiness of milkbones that dogs love and few calories surpisingly my dog is quite satisfied but then she been eating asparagus carrots and green beans for dinner with roasted chicken msot nights for several years likes strawberries and peaches too she ll still get some milk bones and these texas hold em but if cauliflower can helpo her lose some weight we will push that more and its cheaper

these crispy squares are lamb lung our older golden retriever does not care what they are he likes them so much he actually dances around when we get them out even the cat loves them and comes running for a few crumbs when we open the bag our dog is a somewhat picky eater so sometimes i shave bits of these treats over his dry dog food and he loves it
this was gross it lamb lund smelled bad there hard chips my dogs favorite is the texas taffy thats a winner i cut it into peices she loves them
a friend of mine recommended these chocolate nibs and i love them they arrived promptly and undamaged and most importantly the price was great br
what can i say if you love anise bears as much as i do then you understand why i buy several packages at a time i recommend you do the same

i used to buy this sugar for years i do not eat much sugar but still this sugar is called turbinado sugar but is misleading i picked this brand just because it says real turbinado sugar and other brands in the local food store that their sugar is brown because it is colored with caramel or something br br how did i find out i needed just a sweet water few days ago i put this sugar in the raw in the glass the water became brown and on the bottom of the glass i got just pure white sugar crystals what a shame on the producer u can try to put this sugar in your mouth and after few seconds you will spit out pure white crystals as well br br i m just wondering if the consumers can hold the company liable for such a practice
i order a vast quantity of this sugar about twice a year we use it on everything actually once you start using raw sugar white sugar falls short in the taste department

i love this sugar i have been using it packaged in envelopes for a year or two for everything gives a great homemade taste to cookies and packaged in envelopes see a href http www amazon com gp product b lkzk c sugar in the raw raw sugar ounce bags pack of a it is wonderful stuff br br but not in this packaging if you do not use the whole pounds right away the boxes of sugar turn hard as a rock have to microwave them pound them with a hammer and then pour the sugar into a plastic envelope with a sugar bear e g a href http www amazon com gp product b ukowfc jbk bear terra cotta brown sugar saver a to make it possible to use it definitely not worth it buy it packaged in bags or not at all
Summary: the product itself is great but not packaged this way

Text: i have always like sugar in the raw but it is usually too expensive amazon has this priced very reasonably and i have been buying it regularly i also try to avoid any food with hi fructose corn syrup and this sugar is what i like
Summary: great way to purchase sugar in the raw

Text: this is one of the best combination of flavors i keep thinking my family and i will get tired of having this on everything try it on every type of fish salad pot stickers and any tofu dish enjoy great delivery service by the way

a friend turned us on to earth and vine sake teriyaki marinade and i think we are addicted it is great on burgers but i mainly use it on steaks definitely the best teriyaki sauce i have ever used as it provides sweetness without overpowering the natural meat flavors helps the steak and burgers char up real nice too
i tried this special sauce on grilled salmon and grilled chicken it is simply awesome though not cheap and i cannot find anything better yummy br br rh br st louis mo

this is an excellent addition to sweet wines and champagne glasses especially if you are a newbie wine drinker trying to learn to love it this seals the deal sooooo good friends of mine that normally do not care for wine also loved this

while they are not my favorite fruits i do enjoy bananas and i keep them on hand because i love to add them to my smoothies i usually add a heaping teaspoon or two of matcha to all my smoothies too br br this matcha has a delicious banana y flavor that is not too sweet the sweetness is from the fruit flavor and the matcha itself but it does not taste candy sweet at least not to me although it does smell like banana candy when you first open the package and all the while during preparation but i do not get that sort of taste from the matcha and that is a good thing at least in my opinion br br the matcha does taste a little different with the banana flavoring the normal vegetative tones of the matcha meld with the flavor of the banana the fruity notes of the banana in such a way that the vegetal notes seem to disappear and become more fruity the lovely creamy buttery tones are still there and it still tastes like matcha but it is not veggie or grassy tasting like some matcha can taste br br i like

this is one of those matcha that you will want to have around for the kids their friends and when you want to make smoothies or have a sweet treat its not my favorite from red leaf but its not bad at all it just reminds me of circus peanuts do you remember those things sort of like slightly hardened dried out marshmallow like candies we used to get them at the dime store remember when we had dime stores haha anyway i do enjoy this tea takes me back to the good ol days and really where they all that good oh well the point is this is some good stuff and i do like it but its more of a banana candy like flavor rather than fresh ripe banana but at the same time i just do not know how natural of a banana flavor one could possibly get i do not know if i have ever had a better banana flavor in a tea or anything else for that matter that was not a banana itself i think that banana flavored things always tend to have that slightly strange flavor to it br now this is where things get really good i mixed my banana matcha with macadamia nut matcha to make a banana nut like matcha and it was excellent made a smoothie out of it that way too it was quite yummy

we are lucky to have several great coffee roasters in the triangle area of nc counter culture carrboro coffee co joe van gogh and larry beans not to take anything away from the other guys they roast some wonderful coffee too but larry beans is the master of blending beans from different regions to come up with very drinkable delicious coffee wjat sets larry beans apart is that they are consistently less expensive than the other guys mentioned for this reason larry beans gets most of my business
these are the best pumpkin pie bars ever impossible to find in my area so checked on amazon there they were we will have a very happy thanksgiving this year this is our dessert

krusteaz pumpkin pie bars are out of this world we first made them for a big party that we hosted and the guests just went nuts over them they were all gone before we even got a chance to try them so we had to make more to find out what all the hoopla was about well the guests were right and they are absolutely amazing we buy boxes at a time now usually from amazon since the local stores only stock it seasonally but it is definitely worth purchasing they are very easy to make and we love them right out of the oven but i think that they are even more amazing after being in the refrigerator overnight if you love pumpkin you must give this a try

i made prunes a permanent part of my diet because a they are promoted as the best food source of antioxidants and b because they are very sweet and serve as a good sugar substitute for when you have sugar cravings they are also supposed to be good um um against constipation so be careful i usually eat a couple at a time and never more than four never a problem within these limits they are nice to add to oatmeal too along with bananas and raisins or instead of raisins raisins are also a good antioxidant in fact second best after prunes about half as strong br br i ve tried many kinds of prunes and so far sunsweet are the best i like their taste best consistency is good neither too mushy nor dried up like cardboard they keep up well i do keep thim in the fridge but that is strictlyl speaking unnecessary they will be fine for a couple of weeks in the open and they taste better at room temperature and the product quality is consistent no surprises br br i buy them in stores where an oz canister usually costs between four and five bucks this page wants thirty well this must be some sort of error i expect an online price to be better not six to seven times what i can get locally so my bottomline is this sort of prunes is very good but pick them up at your local grocery store not here in fact i got them a few times on sale for like two seventy a piece in a local drugstore believe it or not be very careful with prices here first they jump around quite a bit and second if you subscribe and the price goes up they will just go ahead and charge you more w o bothering to ask you if you agree to pay more avoid subscriptions cause yeah they will give you an extra discount and next month will jack up the price by it is a racket so stay clear br br ps just discovered trader joe carries pitted prunes too a resealable plastic bag holds one pound oz and costs two eighty nine that is about one tenth of what this guy above wants bemuzing to say the least
Summary: good prunes but what is with the price here error

Text: but i coulnd t get it delivered for xmas i was penalized because i did not proscratinate

this line of hot sauces was found on every table during our trip to belize and i have looked at every supermarket i visit at home for marie sharp brand to no avail finally found it on amazon and ordered different types they came well packaged in a timely fashion and those in my household who use hot sauce at almost every meal are thrilled we live in an area with lots of hispanic markets and a sea of spicy sauces and foods available but not marie sharp it is wonderful heat with a little sweet made in and exported by the tiny country of belize i recommend you give it a try amazon usually has special deals when ordering several bottles at a time
Summary: some say this is the best hot sauce

Text: i loved the packs with the flavors except the chocolate covered they were horribly melted into one great big discolored glob figures with temps over in socal everyday during the summer i cannot blame anyone it is what it is
Summary: nuts great chocolate covered horribly melted

Text: these coffee beans are excellent got them within a week great considering they ship from costa rica they have the perfect chocolate to bean ratio

this tea is a nice change from my regular black tea i am not big on the taste of herbal teas so this was a good choice it is closer to black but has it is own special taste which i found myself looking forward to great in the evening as it does not contain caffeine

if you have yet to try rooibos tea you are in for a treat this smooth delicious tea is excellent any time of the day i like that rooibos is naturally caffeine free so i can drink it late at night and not worry about staying up all night i used to drink rooibos when i lived in africa so this brings back fond memories what i like most about this tea besides the flavor is that this is organic and the company supports fair trade practices so you can really feel good about drinking a cup of tea from a company that is making the world a better place this tea is also rich in antioxidants and contains calcium some parents make this tea for their children when they have colic use it like water in baby formula it is a good natural remedy this tea does taste best with milk and i add stevia too although it is also served with lemon and honey br br the rebecca review
these are tasty enough for an emergency snack lunch i keep a few in my file cabinet but our local meijer sells them for apiece even the discount price here is twice that

not sure i would call this a meal on the go the can of tuna salad is like the size of a can of fancy feast and you get ritz sized crackers do get me wrong the tuna salad itself is excellent creamy compared to the pouch style make your own stuff the carrots are a nice touch minimal packaging ready to eat and shelf stable i wish they carried them in the vending machine at work

i saw these on sale at a local store and only bought one because i was not sure i would like them wrong they were great and i loved them could not wait to get more the portion could be small for some but for me it isn t and only calories for all of it i could not believe that the tuna salad is slightly sweet with some little veggie chunks in it really creamy too the can opens easy like a foil on top and the salad seems to match up to the crackers nicely i need to get more only have left i highly recommend these but i do know stuff like this is a taste preference but i am very happy

i love this stuff i am currently deployed in afghanistan and working extremely long hours i keep these delicious little kits in the office and in my wall locker in my sleeping area they have saved me many times when i could not leave to get a complete meal in the dining facility love them
we love trader joe just the clusters vanilla almond granola cereal but were very disappointed with the quantity we recived for the price charged as a result we returned same

even if you think you know italian dry mushrooms order these and find out how wrong you were unbelievably beautiful deeply fragrant terrific huge intact slices flip all the cards over these completely redefine the category not just for sauces soak a few to garnish your steak make a knockout appetizer with these porcini some stock and a shot of marsala to top it all the price is reasonable bravo

i have purchased many porcini mushrooms in grocery and gourmet stores these were the best quality flavor and shape the price was excellent as well i added some to a fresh mushroom soup i made and got an incredible depth of flavor have also used them in braised beef dishes

i have been buying mushrooms from jr mushrooms for over a year now i have ordered maybe times service delivery and quality are always number i highly recommend this company and their products br trevor

i have purchased bags of dried porcini previously from a very expensive gourmet food purveyor in nyc i tried this product the price was a bit lower but the shipping was much lower the dried porcini are as good if not better than from the expensive place they arrived promptly and were packaged well i immediately put about a third of them into an airtight glass jar on my counter packaged the rest up in a doubled freezer bag and put them in the freezer they keep well for over a year the pieces are large sliced well clean and bright the aroma is beautiful tossed some into a pot of braised lamb shanks the day they arrived fabulous

these mushrooms are wonderful they taste rich and woodsy and add real complexity to soups stews or anyplace you would use fresh mushrooms br br dried mushrooms do not weigh much so you will find your order may be larger than you expect the supplier recommends that you store them in the refrigerator or freezer br br shipping was amazing i ordered them on friday and received them on monday standard shipping the package started in massachusetts and arrived in seattle in four days very happy with that

when i bought these mushrooms before they were clearly labled from italy this time the origin is not mentioned on the bag and when i checked their website i see they have written a bunch of malarky about how porcinis taste the same wherever they are from even from north america or china that is just not true porcini from europe taste better the terroir changes the mushroom flavor considerably just as it changes the flavor of grapes made into wine since jr mushrooms refuses to reveal their country of origin i must assume they are selling cheaper possibly contaminated mushrooms from china in order to make a bigger profit beware buy another brand
excellent rich flavor and the mushrooms were freshly dried based on the spores under a microscope were these percent boletus edulis br rick

i was not able to find these mushrooms in any nearby stores so i decided to order on line through amazon the product came very quickly and although oz does not seem like much my recipe called for only oz so this pack will go a long way once reconstituted and added to my pot roast they were delicious they made the sauce really tasty and earthy my family loved them i will use them in stews and soups in the future well worth ordering at amazon great service great product
Summary: porcini mushrooms grade super premium aa oz

Text: these were fair i do not feel they are aa quality would not repurchase

i went for these when i got a free bucks to spend with a new amazon credit card and im glad i did not pay full price br br i was in the process of creating an authentic bolognese meat sauce and i wanted some very hearty mushrooms to add a bit of oomph to the sauce which is meat and onion heavy and i figured from the reviews that these are a meaty tasting mushroom i also see the price asked for these at our local giant eagle grocery stores so yeah i did get a bargain from their rip off pricing but these are basically taking up freezer space br br i ordered two grades a higher grade with bigger shroom pieces less stems etc and in retrospect should have just ordered the scraps or even the dust as i found the big pieces stayed a nasty tough chewy texture even after hours of cooking i also extracted just juice from the mushrooms but the broth was not strong enough to bother i basically just chop these in the food processor and add a lot of them to get a change in flavor in recipes the one ounce bags do not even bother with because it takes a lot to get some flavor from them br br in all honesty i have not used another poricini product so i cannot compare but i am disappointed with the results i got from these it may be they do exactly what they are supposed to for some one with a very tender palate but not for me and in no case are these ever going to be rehydrated and served on steak they just stay too nasty of a product to serve by themselves strictly good for grinding and using in a recipe
one of my most favorite things to eat is a soft pretzel i enjoy going to the movies just so i can eat a soft pretzel these soft pretzels are awesome i will definitely order more in the future

there are no pretzels that compare br i like putting salt on them and putting them in the toaster until crunchy on the outside and soft in the middle sometimes i will have them with mustard but that is not even needed because they taste so good
purchased for lemonade diet and it was more than enough for me and my wife while on the cleanse for days excellent deal for the price paid

i enjoy the flavor of this very delicious soft peach candy it has definitely become one of my all time favorite candies the other flavors that this seller makes are also good but the peach flavor ranks in my book

i just put this candy out two days ago and half the tub is already gone in a small office the candy is very fresh and soft but not too soft a mild lemon flavor not overpowering at all each piece is individually wrapped and arrived unbroken and perfect i would recommend this for anyone and best of all made in the usa

Text: not blenheims the gold standard in apricots but i have had far worse than these the fruits are pleasantly tart sweet and have good nutritional value vitamin a compared to canned peaches which are still a favorite one or two cans were delivered with a small dent but the apricots themselves are unblemished i am sorry the other reviewer seems to have had such a bad experience but i can honestly say that mine were not salty and the can indicates that no salt has been added perhaps it was the potassium in the skins but i think they help intensify the apricot flavors of the pear juice in short these are all natural i e no added sugar or corn syrup which is a plus for me a good item to have on hand for quick healthy desserts either plain or with a sprinkling of granola and a scoop of a fav sorbet sherbet ice cream
i was looking for the old fashion in heavy syrup apricots but this as close as i have found i just add a quarter cup of sugar and cool or freeze it and enjoy yum

Text: i almost did not order these because of the bad review only one can was really dented and i opened that first no damage at all to the contents and the flavor was not salty the apricots are tangy the skin is a bit leathery just like fresh apricots and the cans are quite full not just juice with a few fruits floating around i was very happy with the product and would order again these are delicious for a quick dessert right out of the fridge but would make a nice cobbler too
these apricots are just great they are full of flavor but not too sweet there are about to halves to a can br br there was a problem with some severely dented cans but as usual amazon made it right

if you are looking for a pick me up these apricot halves br by libby are so refreshing the apricots must have been picked and canned at exactly the right time the texture is great they are so tasty and they are not heavy on your tummy they are one of my favorite items to snack on at night

i grew up eating pancakes with real maple syrup and the fake hfcs based syrup just does not compare maple syrup is just wonderful with breakfast or as a sweetener in cooking i had never had grade b maple syrup but recently decided to try it because it is a few dollars cheaper turns out i love it just as much if not more than the grade a syrup i was used to it is not graded by quality like some foods but rather by the color grade b is darker and has a stronger flavor if you like one you will like the other and you will like this anderson maple syrup with amazon subscribe and save it is a much better deal than buying at my grocery store

i ordered this back in october through subscribe and save and it arrived promptly and in good shape i then wrapped it up and two months later drove it nine hours north to wisconsin as part of a christmas gift basket for my parents in waukesha not having noticed that it is actually made by a family owned business further north in this state not only was this a good price for pure maple syrup grade b with strong maple flavor that goes a long way on a stack of pancakes but it was a nice surprise to find that wisconsin maple syrup is just as flavorful as that from new england

i purchased bob red mill grain pancake waffle mix and gosh dernit a small waffle iron i prefer a stronger maple syrup and this is a great buy from anderson if you do not see any reviews in the next couple of weeks it will be due to sticky maple syrup fingers and possible carb overload

i have heard that some grade b maple syrups are too strong maybe so but this stuff is excellent this is the second quart we have received and the flavour is perfect a bit stronger than grade a but sweet and very pleasant to my taste br br personal taste note i also like my honey straight from the hive and unfiltered honey is sometimes a bit stronger as well as it has bits of pollen and comb mixed in that being said i have friends who are more finicky and they like this batch of syrup as well

it is not vermont maple syrup i am originally from upstate ny and grew up with br the vermont maple syrup and i am used to it this syrup lacks that little tang for lack of a better word that the vermont syrup has it does come in second tho
Summary: this is a good syrup but

Text: i had been buying trader joe grade b for about the same price tj is kind of a drive so i used the prime and this is far superior used alton brown recipe for buttermilk pancakes from scratch added blueberries and this syrup capped off a great breakfast

Text: i have had quite a few different grade b maple syrups over the years and this brand is my favorite rich maple flavor and nice thick texture love this syrup on buckwheat waffles and pancakes highly recommended

we just tried the wonderful maple syrup we love it thanks to andersons and hope they keep up the good work just ordered another one excellent

i have tried a few different maple syrups but this is absolutely the best i have tried br br first off grade b has a much more delicious maple flavor than grade a without being overpowering this brand is not as thick as most syrups but it is a quality i happen to love it is way less sticky and you can easily get out every last drop from the jug without having to set it upside down or breaking out a knife to scrape the jug br br i love adding a spoonful into some almond or soy milk for a touch of sweetness mixing in with some peanut butter try it it is delicious or making the best tasting lemonade on earth br br even if you are not on the master cleanse or do not feel it is necessary healthy you should still try the lemonade just to drink it is way better than any refined sugar lemonade i have ever had two tablespoons each of both grade b syrup and fresh lemon juice with oz of water is the most amazingly refreshing beverage you can imagine br br my only complaint is i keep finding so many new uses for it that i have been going threw a jug every week

i am willing to buy every time i run out br br also found it cheaper in a store so will not purchase online anymore

every bit as good as the vermont maple syrups in my opinion as you may know grade b maple syrup has a stronger flavor than grade a and i prefer the grade b version br br looks like amazon out of stock as of this writing hopefully they will get more soon because it is quite good and also was well priced

this gluten free starch is used to thicken soups and gravies its main advantage over other starch thickeners is that it is a permitted ingredient for passover unlike cornstarch and other grain based foods liquids thickened with potato starch should never be boiled supermarkets often stock it among the kosher products i have used this in cakes and in some gentle sauces there is no taste that comes from this so just the flavor of the ingredients comes through it is very silky and fine remember you do not want to let your sauce boil with this starch those who are on a gluten free diet may be able to use this

what can i say about potato starch it is just potato starch so this review will be on barry farm instead of potato starch br br from barry farm you are going to get things cheaper much cheaper i have been buying products from barry farm for several years and they have been great to deal with their shipping is fair but unfortunately flours and starches weigh a lot and shipping is not cheap i purchase items from them that are too expensive to buy locally things i cannot find locally finely ground white corn flour sweet rice flour and ivory teff and items that are better quality than what i can buy locally the best sorghum flour anywhere i usually order or pounds of product at a time and that reduces the overall price per pound to a reasonable cost

a recipe in cooking light recommended that potato starch be added to cupcakes cakes etc when you reduce the amount of butter it worked well and i would recommend this company they had a fast ship and well packaged

fiber one products actually do not have real fiber they contain inulin from chicory root which is technically fiber because the body cannot digest it unfortunately fiber is defined by anything that cannot be broken down easily these products do not contain real fiber the real fiber usually found in whole grain breads and bran cereals so if it says chicory root or inulin in the ingredients you can be sure you are not eating the fiber your body can actually use so if you want lots of sugar and fat without fiber this product is for you

this mustard was given to me by a client this is truly the best dijon mustard i have ever had i highly recommend it i put it on literally everything the other night my husband and i slathered it onto steaks delicious

when i ordered this product i was too lazy to convert mm to inches and consequently discovered the coarse grinder salt was almost to be exact way too coarse for my salt grinder shortly after receiving my order from amazon i received a courtesy email from the spice lab to make sure i was happy with my order i replied that actually i was not happy but the fault was mine because i did not convert the metric dimensions to english units and consequently did not realize how coarse the salt would be which was too coarse for my salt mill two days later i received a package of smaller crystals no charge that is amazing customer service

this product seems to have replaced a similar previous product natural himalayan crystal salt the previous prodcut was a deeper pink color and the texture was better than what i was finding elsewhere this new product himalayan organic natural unprocessed cooking salt is much more like what the competitors are selling i have enjoyed all my products from the spice lab but was disappointed with the replacent for this product

this pink salt has a very nice subtle flavor i did not know salt could vary in flavor until i tried this one we bought the salt initially because a it is organic and b my daughter wanted pink salt but the flavor is what really made the difference i do not know much about salt but i want to say that this has a rounded flavor meaning it is not harsh or distinctive on food rather it seems to become part of the food going in and bringing back the flavor of the food in an enhanced way sounds silly but i am learning good quality ingredients really make a difference

yes i do use this product for salting some of my foods but it also has another handy use because the grains of salt are much larger than normal i use this salt to clean my cast iron grill and skillet i pour one or two tablespoons of salt on the slightly warm grill or skillet and rub the salt into the bottom and sides of the pans with a wadded up paper towel the salt even quickly makes short work of cleaning the ridged bottom of my cast iron grill pan works perfectly i usually keep two or three packages of this product on my spices shelf because i use it frequently both for salting food and cleaning the cast iron

we were pleased with this salt it is actually more salty than regular salt even kosher salt or sea salt a little bit goes a long way i do not usually cook with it but add it to things afterwards i have been hand grinding it

not sure but have been reading about himalayan salt and apparently there is a high fluoride in this salt according to several reviews i have read and that is not so good however it looks very nice in my salt mill and tastes much better than morton salt and i do not use it everyday also it is mined in pakistan if that really matters

placed the order on tuesday received it on saturday with the cheapest shipping super faster the himalayan salt comes in a sealed ziploc bag that has a bottom that allows it to sit up vertically which is convenient for storage especially if you have way too many spices and sacks of beans and sugars and what not like me in addition it came with samples himalayan salt lemon citron flake salt and cyprus white flake salt weighing quite a few grams each sorry does not say the weight and i do not have a scale with me at the moment br br as far as product quality goes i typically buy my himalayan salt from whole foods and aesthetically this salt look exactly like the salt i get from whole foods i have not tasted it yet but i bet it tastes like salt of course price wise this salt the spice lab is way cheaper than buying himalayan salt at whole foods even including shipping

this is a great salt it has a wholesome flavor and i noticed it does not make you thirsty or rise the blood pressure as regular salt does that is the benefit of the natural balance of minerals in it i would recommend this to friends and health conscious people
this salt is so pink and taste like the ocean i love it make sure to buy a grinder of some sort if you plan to use it on salads or sprinkle on cold dishes

this is the first time i have used land mined salt i usually use salt from various sea sources after reading several reviews here on amazon i decided to try this salt i was very pleasantly surprised the first time i tasted the salt the flavor was fresh and subtle not like the salt you usually buy in the grocery stores plus it has a lot of trace minerals your body needs i highly recommend this salt

i love pink himalayan salt it is loaded with minerals and taste great i do not have to use as much as the conventional table salt and i do not feel bad about using it because i know that it is also really good for my body

the product has far fewer pink crystals than shown in the picture which is perfectly fine with me the salt is coarse excellent for salt mills it tastes great and the size is what i wanted and have not been able to find elsewhere the price and service is excellent as well

Text: right now i own cats that i found outside a good eight years ago and i found another cat which i adopted also i have always fed them eukanuba adult lamb rice dry cat food and they truly love it when you first open the bag you can smell the savory aroma of the cats that i found outdoor and adopted one turned out to be a turkish angora and the other has markings similar to that of a snow leopard and the third cat i found out is part egyptian mau i also feed a feral cat who has been living in my back yard for years they all love this food and even when they changed the formula of this food a few years ago they still eat it and love it if you read the ingredients it is excellently made and a real plus for their diet they have been eating it for years now and i have yet to see any of my cats turn up their nose to this food br br the other dry foods that my cats love is fancy feast gourmet filet mignon flavor with real seafood shrimp dry cat food and they have just started eating eagle pack natural pet food indoor formula for cats and a cat food brand called artemis i have not any problems with them eating any of these dry foods and i have been rescuing cats for over years now and have owned as many as cats at one time one set of kittens were born outdoor and i brought them indoors with their mother and kept them all until the day they passed on they all lived to be close to years of age and they too ate eukanuba lamb rice and loved it br br i have had foods that they turned up their nose with like chicken soup and taste of the wild the same way we humans have our likes and dislikes is the same way that these cats have their likes and dislikes what is good for one cat might not be good for another you just have to learn your cat and see what they like and just give it to them while my cats are in love with eukanuba lamb rice maybe your cat will also or maybe not but it is not fair to not try this food because of a review where the owner says that their cat does not like it as previously stated maybe your cat will not like it or maybe your cat will love it i have tried cat foods based on good reviews figuring that the food will automatically be a hit and sometimes it was and sometimes it wasn t it is all up to the cat

oberto cocktail pep used to be so much better than this i had been buying them direct from the oberto online store for many years and i could not get enough no matter what size i ordered they were always excellent br br however in the past few years the quality of their cocktail pep has sure gone down they used to be very tight and snappy when you would bite into them the outer casing of each sausage was almost totally smooth because they were packed so tightly and they had a superior spicy flavor br br nowadays they are all soft and mushy with bland often stale flavor i get the impression that they are cutting corners to save a buck by not stuffing each sausage casing as tightly as they once did i believe this allows more air to permeate the meat and causes the bad flavor that many people are complaining about br br every year or so i get to craving those old style cocktail pep that i loved so much and i order a package hoping that they will have changed i keep thinking maybe i just got a bad batch last time but every time i am disappointed all over again

this organic grass fed ghee embodies everything that a modern healthful food should be it is tasty healthful fresh and lovingly produced by hand in small batches and according to ages old methods and principles br br i began using this ghee as a part of a transition to eating more healthy home cooked foods more recently i participated in an ayurvedic cleanse that required that i take cup of plain warm ghee for several mornings straight though this can be an unpleasant experience with ghee of lower quality the pure indian foods ghee was truly delicious the flavor is clean and sweet without any of the harshness or overbearing unctuousness of other ghees even those labelled as organic and not a hint of rancidity to which i am very sensitive br br only unhomogenized milk is used for this ghee which is unusual and extremely beneficial homogenization alters the structure of milkfats and adversely impacts their bioavailability and handling in the blood this attention to the quality of raw materials is just one example of this company dedication to their customers health br br highly recommended

i tried both this brand and the a href http www amazon com gp product b iipmw purity farm organic ghee clarified butter ounce a brand of ghee because as far as i can tell these are the two brands that are from completely grass fed cows which i was elated to see because of the health and flavor benefits br br i ll say that this one takes the slight edge in the taste and aroma department it has a rich buttery smell and it seems like they clarify it a little less because it is slightly grainy when you taste it at room temperature br br that said i find myself buying the purity farm ghee because this brand is almost twice as expensive and while it has the edge in taste it is very very slight and not worth the big premium to me it might be worth it if i was primarily using this at room temperature like on bread but i usually use regular butter for that and for cooking you really cannot tell any difference in flavor there is also a chance i am getting ghee from different times of the year for each brand which does affect the flavor br br so in short amazing high quality ghee but a bit overshadowed by the much cheaper and also amazing high quality a href http www amazon com gp product b iipmw purity farm organic ghee clarified butter ounce a brand ghee
Summary: tastes amazing but a bit expensive

Text: ghee is more than an indulgence ghee can be viewed as an essential vitamin supplement albeit one that tastes really good ghee is especially necessary in a vegetarian diet in my opinion but it can be a healthy addition to any diet br br some research shows that ghee can even lower cholesterol br br i performed an extensive survey of the top ghee products available i compared quality and value ghee is so important as an addition to the diet that quality should not be sacrificed especially because only a very small amount of ghee needs to be used br br the ghee comparison table can be found at this blog see link in comment br br when i started this ghee comparison i was primarily interested in finding the best value in organic ghee products however i learned that several of the products go well beyond just organic standards it was a very pleasant surprise to find out that such high quality ghee products are available it is also great to see that my two top picks are both available on amazon com grass fed organic ghee is one of those top picks br br because such high quality ghees are available i focused on understanding which product is the most authentic some of the ghees are much more authentic than others the information in the table link above reflects that fact br br the focus of my evaluation was not gourmet cooking it was optimum health therefore i was concerned first with which ghee product is the healthiest br br i rank grass fed organic ghee as one of the very best products grass fed organic ghee is made in accord with the ancient traditions such as phase of the moon chanting etc it is a great quality great tasting product and the good price makes it a great value i highly recommend this ghee
Summary: very high quality ghee and a great value

Text: this ghee is the best available the fat is high quality and the nutrients are powerful due to the fact that the ghee is made from grass fed butter during the spring and fall season when the cows are eating fast growing green grass that last part is important that means that this ghee has high amounts of k compared to other ghees k is the great bone and teeth building nutrient it helps the body deposit calcium appropriately k cannot be gotten from green leafy vegetables it can only be gotten from animal fats organ meats or some kinds of fermented vegetables br br also apparently this ghee has tested as high in k as the very expensive butter oil that i used to buy br br finally i have seen an improvement in my kids teeth since i have been giving them several spoonfuls of ghee each day we use it like a supplement br br thank you for a high quality product

when pet promise a safe and healthy pet food went out of business i was desperately looking for another healthy food that had no by products rendered fats meat meals or outsourced ingredients you might want to check out what these types of ingredients can include if your stomach can take it but avoid commercial manufacturers spins on this good books to get in this regard are foods pets die for and protect your pet br a href http www amazon com gp product food pets die for shocking facts about pet food a br a href http www amazon com gp product protect your pet more shocking facts a br br my cats were completely unaffected by the melamine contamination tragedy of which killed many pets especially cats because their pet promise food was one of the few brands in america that did not use outsourced ingredients and was never on the recall list unlike some of the very expensive premium brands i felt so lucky that i had already switched to pet promise a petfood company that bought ingredients only from north american farmers using sustainable agriculture and free range livestock br br i finally discovered halo products and was encouraged by the fact that ellen degeneres a devout animal lover herself not only endorses it but also has become part owner of the company their website also included a specific message written to us former pet promise users so i went to my health food store and bought some br br i was delighted to see that it had no by products no rendered meats no meat meals and that the label stated that all its ingredients are made in the usa except the pea protein from canada furthermore the salmon in halo is wild alaskan not farmed salmon aka pharmed salmon full of antibiotics etc moreover it is low in carbohydrates and even includes probiotics in the mix making it even more promising than pet promise br br but the ultimate test was whether my cats would eat it or not unlike my dachshunds who would eat just about anything that hit the floor they re really low to the ground you know cats are notorious for their persnickety eating habits but they love it cannot get enough so i have to dole it out so they do not overeat and after five months their health and energy seem to be great br br oh and hi ellen and many thanks
Summary: my cats love this very healthy food

Text: after finding out what horrors i would been perpetrating on my kitties with their expensive premium pet food i set out to find something that was not full of by products and unnecessary corn ingredients halo spot spew definitely fit that bill and their ingredients are probably the best you will find in a cat food my cats however were not as impressed as i was and turned their noses up at their new food they did eat it but clearly were not enthused br although i like the human grade ingredients used in halo foods i do wish they used more meat sources there are only a couple protein sources in the food and as a result the protein content of spot stew around is also a little lower than what i would like br overall however this is definitely a great food to feed your pets though if you have a cat that is a finicky eater or that needs a high protein food halo spot stew may not be for you

before i begin my review let me say this i read the product specs especially the dimensions br i measured the space i have and armed with that knowledge i ordered the item br br the item is exactly as described and pictured and because i pre measured i knew it would fit unlike other reviewers who apparently could not be bothered and then give it a low rating as a result br br it a simple design and well built it is sturdy enough to hold the weight of my large cuisinart k cup brewer with a full reservoir it is a solid wire frame build and the rails the drawer runs on are part of that wire design the mesh walls are a tad light weight but they are not load bearing and are only meant for aesthetics and to contain the k cups i also store splenda packets in one column of mine br br other than my normal blend i tend to have up to additional flavors for a weekend treat or just to mix it up on occasion keeping these loose on the counter or bouncing around mixed up in a box made it a pain to pick through them but now i keep them in line in the segmented rows in the drawer having a lack of storage space in my cupboards and kitchen drawers makes this the natural and ideal choice br br many have been disappointed that it did not fit but all you need to do is measure your brewer footprint and it is height beneath your cupboards if applicable br br it not a perfect item the mesh could be a tad better grade or the price about lower but otherwise highly recommended purchase
Summary: great tray for storing various k cup varieties

counter under the cupboard that it sits under for me to lift the top of the keurig open to put new k cups in and to fill the water etc that additional inches really makes a difference i can no longer open the top of the keurig all the way without banging the cupboard we all know that you do not need to open it all of the way but when that is what you were used to doing well you can understand i pretty much bang the cupboard every day now another drawback to the idea of purchasing this soley to save space is that you cannot keep anything in front of the drawer since obviously you need to open the drawer to get the k cups out i used to keep the coffee condiments in front of my keurig and now i can t br br here the bottom line this is a great product in the sense that it gets the carousel if you have one off your counters but i would only buy this if you have ample clearance above your keurig now to be able to still lift the top open once you set this up and you do not need to use the space in front of the drawer br br happy coffee drinking br br update br almost a year later i am still using the storage drawer yes from time to time i forget and still whack the cupboard but the keurig and the cupboard are no worse for the wear i still keep my eye out for better storage solutions and none have really looked like they would be any better while the product is well made and has been durable still looking practically new and is heavily used in my kitchen i still think it is a bit pricey for what it is i just checked online and it still ranges from to i am hoping that nobody pays for this when you can get it for plus use a coupon for off at bed bath and beyond br of all the reviews i have written on amazon this one seems to bring some not so nice comments from people which is kind of odd to me but everyone is entitled to their own opinion i still hold firm at stars as i mentioned in a reply to one comment to me that is a b there is nothing wrong with a b product i think most people that buy this product will be very impressed with it is durability thanks for reading

Text: i can finally get rid of the five boxes of k cups sitting on my counter the padded top of the drawer shelf means i do not get a rattling vibration noise when the brewer runs and the drawer slide action is very smooth the drawer extends far enough out that it is easy to get the last cup in a row so you can see all the cups at once much better than digging around in a bunch of boxes the whole thing feels very sturdy and has a nice modern look to it

Text: this is an excellent k cup storage drawer it holds the cups nicely the drawer is a bit sturdy and supports the weight of the machine it is easy to clean i would definitely recommend this product to a loved one however i would also recommend that they purchase it elsewhere i purchased the exact item at my local bb b for this past sunday that is almost half price

Text: where do you put your k cups right f ing here that is where br br this thing is solid and does not slide around on the counter top plus it is sturdy enough to handle the platinum keurig without issue and it looks saucey too br br i only gave it stars as the slider tray was is a little bent only noticeable if you are right up next to it definitely not the packaging or shipping damage looks like it came from the factory this way br br also since its of stock from this store you can find it at bed bad beyond for

Text: i store my mugs creamer splenda packets and napkins on top of this and just love it my coffee maker is next to it it like my little coffee station i did not buy it here though because it is cheaper at bed bath beyond shipping here it is i am gonna get a nd one to stack on top of my first and then put the same stuff i had on it back on top i recommend this stackable drawer type unit br br

first off i very much prefer this look to the rotating holders plus it holds more k cups than they do i also like that it takes up less storage space than those carousels plus a machine i have limited counter top space and it is already crowded br a minor issue as i had read before was that the added height to the machine causes lid to hit the cupboards while opening and closing i am ok with pulling it away from the wall a bit and will eventually place my machine in a more open counter space to avoid this it does bother my husband more though br i was disappointed with the product a bit my main problem was the material on the top of the drawer that you rest the machine on was not done very aesthetically as soon as i opened what stood out to me was that it had to have been hand cut and was cut slightly wrong on my product first i can still see the pencil mark all across the front then it was cut too short and coroner was not cut squarely it happens to h ave also been across the front edge of my product so it just sticks out to me and lessens it is appeal br i find the drawer to operate smoothly and easily you can not reach the back row of k cups while full but that is not a big deal to me at all

Text: this drawer is fabulous and holds a ton of kcups it does make the machine too tall for low hanging cabinets however it saves on total counter space needed versus a carousel and looks great it is very sturdy and should last for a long time i have the keurig platinum and have plenty of room to put sugar splenda packets or mugs love it
i have one of these and love it but i would never pay this much for it got it a bed bath beyond for and that was not a sale just their regular price
i have this drawer and the carousel i find it easier and less cluttered to use the drawer i also have my keurig on top of it with lots of room around it for misc items

this item is great i dont have a lot of counter space in my kitchen or space in my draws to store my k cups so this item was perfect for me it sits right below my keurig i would highly recommend this item a great buy and an awesome space saver

able to store my coffee right under the machine i still have room on top for my soda maker keurig is a mini br the only thing i do not like is that the pods that are in the back may be a little difficult to get would be better if there was a spring that would push these last pods forward slightly as the others get used other wise much more useful than a carousel br as another reviewer mentioned can get this item for at bed bath and with usual off coupons for even less it also does raise the keurig about from the counter so be sure to have room above the coffee maker as well as on the sides

as other have mentioned this is available in other stores for much cheaper so i recommend to shop around before buying on amazon br br when it comes to the actual product i highly recommend buying this if you own a keurig you are able to discretly hide so many of the keurig cups the carousel is a neat product but when you do not have counter space it just does not work br br this unit is pretty great quality but i do find that it is tough to slide sometimes the material that they use on the top of the tray makes sure that your keurig does not move at all br br highly recommend that you pick one up whether it be from bbb or amazon
Summary: fantastic product but way too expensive on amazon

Text: i have a rather small kitchen and a tower type holder would take up too much counter space this holder is perfect for me the rubberized top holds my keurig plus a sugar dispenser a bowl of sweet n low and a tall shot glass with coffee stir sticks very convenient and the drawer slides out easily to hold k cups i am thinking of getting a nd one and stacking them so that i have room for cups clearance above my keurig is good br br stars for price at i had to really think about it for a bit but it works better for me than the cheaper options would so i am happy with the purchase

like a lot of people i have very limited kitchen space and my keurig brewer itself takes up an entire countertop i was never able to fit one of the traditional revolving k cup stands in my kitchen so i generally leave my k cup boxes on top of the refrigerator not very tidy and a little inconvenient but the best i could do i was thrilled to find this holder at the store where it cost about beware some of these amazon seller prices and bought it immediately it is perfect it holds k cups at a time so i can stock it and put the k cups away in the closet for a few weeks until i start running low it also complements my black and silver brewer nicely it is very stable and has a no slip top so you do not have to worry about your keurig tipping over it does add about inches of height so make sure you have enough clearance if your brewer is under a cupboard highly recommended
plain and simple all you have to do is buy this drawer and set your coffee maker on top of it and you are done easy to get your k cups whenever brewing coffee right at your fingertips
Summary: very neat drawer for you coffee maker

Text: great way to stock your k cup assortment without having to take up extra counterspace w another item such as the carousel or tower units offered if your kitchen is small
Summary: great organizer without needing extra space

Text: item appears to be keurig brand by title description big however upon receiving it it is an off brand my perfect kitchen sold at bed bath beyond and at half the price i was disappointed in the jading and sent it back signed up for bbb email promos and got a off coupon for use in the store so i bought this exact item for reg only in store i mean exact do your homework and save yourself some money oh and the item itself is great we have the larger platinum b and it does have an issue with the cupboards but i just pulled it forward about in and it is perfect i am fortunate enough to have a lot of counter space and i may move it to an open top area so for us it is all good
this is a great product however it is only about at bed bath and beyond and if you look in the sunday paper always a off coupon
Summary: much cheaper at bed bath and beyond

Text: the keurig storage drawer is a perfect match for the coffee maker the coffee machine sits perfectly on the top and makes getting the refills soooo easy br i looked at other storage options but i found this to be ideal really glad i bought it

i was ready to buy one of the carousel type k cup storage devices when i saw this one br it is a bit exepnsive but it preserves counter space and keeps the k cups right there br i also use it to store the ez cup reusable system

this was a gift for our daughter she loves it since it holds more cups than the carousel she loads in her favorites in the front part and less used flavors in the rear the only drawback might be is that if your cabinets hang low over your countertop you may have difficulty with the added inch or two in height since the brewer sits on top of the drawer

ordered this on the advice of the single serve coffee forum br br cons br br drawer is metal mesh on metal mesh so it does not slide smoothly it is pretty clunky to pull open and even harder to close br it does not pull out far enough to reach the back of the drawer so you have to tip the final k cup out which is hard if you have an entire coffee maker on top br again all mesh so the cups do not sit smoothly in the tray and the sections are a hair too narrow so the cups brush one another awkwardly br my upper cabinets are raised higher than average because we are both tall and this still did not leave us enough room to open the maker while on the drawer br br pros br br for our modern kitchen it is nice to look at br it comfortable fits my capresso frothpro on one side and two oz ghirardelli bottles front to back on the other so it still saves us counter space br when i tried my keurig on it i expected some buckling but it seemed to stand firm even with a full water tank br br all in all for it is a lot nicer to look at than the spinning barrel style holders and i do not need my coffee to be on display plus it looks easy to clean which for me is a plus

i love this drawer my keurig cuisinart coffeemaker fits on it perfectly it holds k cups so i always have many options for hot beverages right where i need them i think it looks great and the drawer slides in and out very easily do not know how they could have made this simple item any better

i just got a keurig for my mom who is and disabled it is so much easier now for her to get her cup of coffee and tea i read over many reviews to decide whether to buy the carousel or this storage drawer i finally decided on this for the space saving design it was the right choice it is sturdy durable and somewhat attractive it slides out smooth and quiet and holds a nice amount of cups it pulls out far enough so you can see the cups far in the back of the drawer i am hoping that they will make one that has drawers one on top of the other so i could store more cups at a time this is not beautiful if your looking at the aesthetic value of it but works for what it is intended for

when i first purchased my keurig coffee maker i could not decide how to store the k cups i did not want to give br up my counter space for the carousel i settled for a flat holder that with open compartments and could be br put in a drawer or attached to the wall i did not want to spend the extra few dollars for this drawer type br after shifting that one around from drawer to balanced against the wall i finally gave in and went for this great holder that allows the keurig to sit on top and now i have my counter space back and a nice neat area for my br keurig i hope that i can save someone some time and money by letting you know about my experience
Summary: tried others and this is the best

Text: storage drawer is very handy to keep under the keurig instead of having sevaral boxes of k cups it is sturdy however one of the adhesive foot pads came off just stuck it back on from moving the whole thing back and forth to open the pod lid wide enough

a birthday gift to myself my hubby gave me the keurig for christmas and i was having a hard time storing all my flavors of the k cups i love this for you pull it out and there they are flavors and all good construction too and it all fits under my cabinet with room to open and fill the reservoir

Text: i love that this drawer holds so many k cups its great to have them right under the machine its great for those times when i am having company i can load it up with what i know they like each time someone different comes over i can just simply put their choices in the drawer and they can make a fresh beverage any time they want they dont need to dig in my pantry or come get me to make something for them handy to have i love it

my husband drilled some extra holes and mounted it under a cabinet it holds more than my carousel and you can see all the flavors at once the hard mesh sides and front allows you to easily check the coffee supply without opening the drawer there were no sharp edges on the metal looks like it will hold up well a good value for the money

i do not know if i have bad one doubt it but it does not slide well unless you lift up on it it is like the tracks are too tight and if you try pulling straight out it hangs and then the cups inside go flying when it finally does slide because you end up jerking it

Text: i bought this for my office it was perfect because it fits just right on the mini fridge with room for my mugs on the side we love it because you can now see what to pick from when before we were going through boxes of k cups

this drawer is very sturdy as long as it is on a flat surface and holds plenty of k cups it is great because it does not use your counter space and even with my heavy cuisinart k cup coffee maker on top it still slides in and out very easily love it

i had been frustrated trying to figure out how to store the k cups on my counter top the carousals were not only spendy but took up too much space i love this product yes it does raise my machine up but is not that to be expected when it goes under the machine i get a kick out of people putting down a product when it is exactly as described and the reviewer did not have the foresight to see this besides mine does not sit under the cupboard so its not a problem the drawer slides easily and the top does not sag or buckle under the weight it is perfect for my limited space i would like to find one just like this one but a little smaller for my smaller machine at work

sturdy well made convenient fits well under the keurig machine and does not take extra space easy pull out drawer to view coffee choices

this drawer is just awesome for holding the k cups when the boxes get nearly empty and it seems pointless to store them on the shelf it keeps the k cups nice and dry and handy best of all is that the machine can rest safely on the top giving it it is own little area in the kitchen kind of like a little break room we love this and the shelf we bought to hang on the wall to hold the boxes
ordered both had bent tracks and i actually cut my finger on one of the wires sticking out but you get what you pay for

works great definitely worth the i read another review that the drawer sticks i ran into this problem also easy fix just bend the sides of the pull out drawer in with a little bit of pressure i was afraid that i might break it but it seems to be very sturdy like i said just a little bit of pressure the drawer slides out no problem believe me if it had issues i would never hear the end of it from my wife also i have my keurig b on top of it with no issues of bowing there is enough room on the side to fit some containers creamer sugar makes the counter top a lot more functional
this is very sturdy and not as some reviews were that stated this was flimsy br i have no issues with it at all and would highly recommend it to anyone of my friends

Text: my order was processed quickly and arrived on time slide it out of the box and set it in place now everything is at my finger tips

this item works out great keeps everycup of coffee at your fingertips and definitely looks good sitting on my unclutterd counter quick ship aaaa

i have never taken the time to write a review before but in this case others need to be warned off i expected to get a product similar to what i have seen in the stores but this obviously is a replica the sliders on the bottom of the tray that are supposed to keep the tray straight when you slide it in and out broke off before i even got it out of the package it is not something you can fix unless you have a solder gun even then it is very sticky pulling the tray out because there are no rollers it is metal on metal which does not work well without some sort of lubrication i love amazon but this product is inferior at best
this product is well worth the money others carry a similar product that is cheaper but the quality is way cheaper also

Text: i am giving this stars not because it fits the way it should but because i love it where i put it first this does not fit under my keurig properly my lid to the keurig will not open all the way if this sits under the machine this is a quality piece it does not feel flimsy or a crappy build the drawer works smooth with no problems the k cups fit perfectly the reason i love it is i had my husband drill a few holes and mounted it under my counter in the corner where the cupboards meet i uploaded two pictures under images for you to see what i mean this works great as an under the counter holder i warn you measure your cupboards first some of my cupboards were not deep enough to install this as an under counter product however the corner where my cupboards meet worked super i love that it is off my counter but it actuallly looks nice and keeps all the cups in a space that is easy to use and does not take up precious counter space in my small kitchen

i purchased this storage drawer so that i could better organize my mass of k cups it currently sits underneath my keurig it looks very nice and does what it is supposed to it is a simple design and while it does not save a lot of room it does not take up much room either
tray fits perfectly under the coffee maker color compliments color of coffee maker non skid top keeps coffee maker in place drawer is ventilated ample storage space love it

i love products that reduce clutter are functional and do not hurt your eyes to look at i really like this drawer i have it beneath my cuisinart keurig k cup mini brewing system it is sturdy enough to hold the coffee maker this is a product i would highly recommend
a wonderfully ingenious way to keep all your k cups in one place without taking up extra counter space keeps several different types of my favorite coffee i love it

what a great idea i hated wasting a whole drawer with my various k cup boxes tea cider coffees etc i thought about the carousels but did not like the idea of having it on my counter i wanted something that was more discreet and space saving br br more discreet yes br it looks nice and you cannot even tell what is in it br br space saving yes br my keurig b fits perfectly on it br br i hate having cluttered looking counter tops this drawer allows me to store my cups neatly in a unit that looks nice i also love how it has dividers for each row to allow you to organize your k cups you cna slo pull the drawer out pretty far so that you can see all of your k cups i also love that i get my drawer where my k cups were previously stored back br br i do wish that the top of it looked a little nicer the black spongy material on the top looks a little cheap because most of it is covered with the keurig you do not really see much of it anyway so it is not a big deal at all but the material is a bit on the cheaper side still nice though br br additional notes things that were mentioned by previous posters already but that bear repeating br br beware with your keurig on top of it you may not be able to open the top br i was not thinking and failed to read one of the reviews that mentioned this and got this without realizing this duh sure enough i cannot open the top with my keurig on the drawer ooops no biggie though someone commented with a great idea put felt on the bottom of the drawer so that you can easily slide the entire unit out when you need to use your keuirg i plan to do this br br it is much cheaper elsewhere br at the time of this review it is listed on amazon for almost but thanks to a previous reviewer i found it on bed bath and beyond for and i got free shipping too

Text: looked all over for this great space saver keeps the pods neat water proof top is great for me keeps me from soaking the kcups

pros br this is a fairly simple product a metal drawer with dividers great for organizing all the your k cups less counter space than a carousel br br cons br expensive a metal drawer with dividers for almost it raises your coffee maker about we have a keurig b and when it is placed on this product and shoved back towards the wall it will not open fully to accept the k cup because of the wall cabinets it resides under its not a big deal to just pull the unit forward but i think its definitely worth mentioning
