Text: here is the perfect solution for storing k cups until you need them it holds k cups and there is plenty of room for his hers and theirs br br this unit is well built light in weight perfectly functional in design and low enough so you can put your keurig coffee maker on top of it and still put it under your overhead kitchen cabinets

this is so nice to have when space is limited because of the height of our cabinets we were not able to place this under the machine but have it on the side with our other coffee making supplies on top it stores plenty of kcups for easy use much better for us than a stand
this is my second purchase i have so many varieties of tea and coffee that one was not enough space they stack nicely next to my keurig

not only does this store all those annoying little kcups but i put sugar packs and creamers it it too the black top is great because it does not show every little splash of coffee a much better solution that the tree type stands

when i originally started looking to buy a keurig it was a deal that came with this drawer i thought it seemed like a great idea immediately i ended up waiting a couple more months before i bought my keurig and it no longer came with the drawer i looked everywhere for the drawer because i liked how it kept the cups hidden from view but still handy like one of the carousels i could not find the drawer it was sold out everywhere i looked for a month i finally found it on amazon and at a good price the drawer has lived up to my expectations i keep my keurig in an area where there are no upper cabinets so i do not have trouble with it being higher now i also alternate k cups facing up and down so i can get more in the drawer i highly recommend this product if you are looking for a way to keep k cups within easy reach organized and hidden

this storage drawer fits in perfectly on our countertop we can either set the keurig on top of it or beside it and still store a large amount of k cups where people can get at them easily totally satisfied

saw this at a local big box chain store so of course i had to look for it on amazon as soon as i got home received the item in days prime really rocks does not it and am so happy we can finally get rid of our k cup carousel br br this drawer holds more k cups and keeps them out of sight freeing countertop real estate it glides open smoothly and seems very well made it was shipped in a nice sturdy box and arrived in excellent condition the drawer has divided sections each of which holds k cups perfect for us since we like variety the drawer does not pull completely out but has a built in stop it does not seem to make it harder to get the last k cup out at least for me i am a female with average lady fingers ymmv still i like the stop i would not want to have k cups rolling all over the kitchen floor br br note if you keep your machine under upper cabinets you will likely need to pull it out away from the wall to allow enough clearance to insert k cups and fill the reservoir we just turned our unused kitchen desktop it counter is lower into a coffee station br br my only complaint is that amazon does not carry the t disc version of this drawer so tomorrow it is back to the store to buy one of those got to keep my tassimo machine happy too br br this product is a no brainer
this is a great idea and a well made product it just seems to me that it was a no brainer to slide the whole thing out from under the cupboard this item is a great space saver

until i found this item i was taking up valuable storage space in my overhead cabinet with boxes of k cups i like variety this tray is sturdy holds plenty of k cups and basically disappears from view once you put it under your keurig i love it so much that i ordered one for my cousin we both grew up reciting a place for everything and everything in it is place guess what she loves it too if you are lamenting having bought the carousel simply sell it at your next garage sale and give this tray a try

k cup storage drawer is great i have the carousel but wanted additional k cup storage the drawer fits the bill and takes up no additional space since it sits underneath the keurig brewer no more k cup boxes to hide somewhere

i was originally looking for keurig coffee on amazon and stumbled across this gem i bought it for work to centralize my coffee stuff and it has been perfect k cups stirrers sweetener packets all fit nicely in one place right below my keurig the only thing that would make this product better would be if the dividers in the drawer were solid so stirrers did not have a chance to roll around but since i can tell it was originally designed to only hold k cups i cannot complain great for saving space and looks nicer than the tall spice rack looking k cup holders out there would def recommend
Summary: perfect for what i was looking for

Text: i purchased this holder after seeing it in an open house and i just had to have one very well built and engineered the drawer slides very easy and it holds more k cups than i expected overall a great design with no disappointments definitely recommend buying one since it takes up no more space than the coffee maker itself
good storage of the k cups as well as enough storage so that it can support my keurig coffee maker it easily solved the problem of how to store all my k cups much better than the rotating tower

we are neat people and keep our counter clear so this works great for us it is well made slides easily and loads in a minute also cups do not catch sunlight like the vertical racks would in our bright kitchen

Text: the silver pearl dust is reasonably easy to use please use a light and careful touch i used this to decorate spritz cookies i used the tree mold and the cookies were lovely and tasty

so versatile white pearl can be used to decorate almost anything dust or paint it onto chocolate decorations see whimsical bakehouse book directly onto icing and cookies br br highly recommend you check your local michaels or joann amazon usually has competitive prices but these are at your local craft store is wayy overprice on amazon com

the product came in a small vile and i honestly thought that there would not be enough to dust all of the cookies with it to my surprise i ended up making more cookies than originally planned dusted them with the pearl dust and had so much of it left over i was so amazed at how far this stuff goes it gave the cookies such a beautiful finish

i wish i had found this product sooner br so far have only used it on my homemade chocolate truffles and it does add a beautiful almost mysterious bronze luster to them almost hard to believe that it really is edible br very happy with it and would definitely recommend
Summary: only discovered this recently bronze powder is truly lustrious and beautiful

Text: when i added this to the cake it was so beautiful that i could not believe it even the customer was impressed it made the cake look more professional for someone who is still learning to make beautiful cakes
san marcos is by far the best brand of chipotle in adobo take that wonderful smokey flavor and add it to refried beans and it is a no brainer these are a great medium hot bean
Summary: the best chipotle in refried beans how can you go wrong

Text: i have recently started buying erin baker breakfast cookies because they are a fast easy and nutritious way for me to start my day this flavor is not always available as it is a limited edition flavor but fear not these cookies do very well when frozen and can go directly from the freezer to the microwave for about seconds and you have a nice chewy delicious cookie br br this flavor is delicious some of the major ingredients are whole grain rolled oats raisins dried apples walnuts coconut and spices cinnamon nutmeg and carrot cake spices the cookie comes in at calories fiber with g of sugar and iron br br i was doubtful that a large cookie would sustain me as lunch for me is about hours away but i have no problem this cookie is filling and delicious as with any fiber filled product make sure you do drink fluids br br if you do buy these or any of the other breakfast cookies be assured that you can freeze and microwave so on the limited edition flavors you can buy extra if you really love a particular flavor
Summary: limited edition flavor that deserves a try

Text: i bought these in mid july with day delivery along with other flavors this is my least favorite i still have the original bunch while i have finished the others and have re ordered them for some reason there is an after taste that i really do not like with this flavor wish i did like it i will keep getting the others through subscribe and save as long as they are available the others are great when i do not want to cook a full breakfast or lunch i do freeze and microwave them then drink a cup of milk with them very filling and satisfying i recommend the other flavors i have tried but not this one i have tried and like the oatmeal and raisin the banana walnut the chocolate chunk and the apple and caramel flavors ymmv

so far i have tried caramel apple fruit nut morning glory and banana walnut flavers i have also ordered but not yet received the pumpkin spice cookies all of them are an excellent meal replacement or nutritious snack the ingredients are wholesome there is no high fructose corn syrup and they have a good supply of protein fiber to stave off hunger for several hours the caramel apple is probably my favorite because it seems to be the moistest but i really love all of the flavors like other reviewers i freeze them and then microwave a cookie for seconds when i am ready to eat it i find the cookies taste best warmed up even though the calorie count is higher than many cookies i think you get a lot of nutritional value with these

i have tried many flavors of erin baker breakfast cookies and until i tried this one i liked them all the ingredients list mentions that they have a touch of carrot cake spice added but it is more than a touch unless you really really love carrot cake you might want to make a different flavor selection my favorite is the chocolate chunk cherry but it appears it is only seasonal i wish i could get it all year long the oatmeal raisin is my second favorite i wish i had ordered them instead of these morning glory
the cookies at first taste good but it follows up with an interesting after taste it is also a little dry had to down a whole glass of milk but overall it was not too bad

erin baker breakfast cookies are an excellent alternative to energy bars and other trail foods they pack well and provide nutritious calories and sustenance they are not gourmet desert cookies they have a lower ratio of sugar and fat and more whole grain carbohydrates they will not taste as good but they will provide energy without a sugar spike or clogging your arteries with saturated fats br br they re still pretty good tasting to me and taste even better during an mile hike

i decided to give these a try but was a little nervous about the flavor i normally go with chocolate or oatmeal raisin these are great kind of fruity but very good br i think these are perfect for mornings where i do not have time for breakfast and want something i can grab and eat while driving or once i am at the office

i ordered these cookies after purchasing some chocolate ones at a local grocer the natural ingredient list is what caught my attention we have enough food products on the market that are over processed and contain so many artificial things that most people cannot even pronounce i ordered the morning glory variety in a trio pack which also contained the oatmeal raisin and the fruit and nut varieties since i had tried the chocolate cookie but was not aware of the other choices i started combing the internet in an attempt to mass order these cookies after seeing the huge variety of cookies available directly from the product maker i took a chance on looking at amazon to compare prices bingo amazon won since the value of the cookies came to a couple of cents more than per cookie i had to place an order everyone who has tasted these cookies have fallen in love with them i highly recommend them to anyone who is looking a wholesome natural snack that you can feel good about eating or serving to guests

sue i think you got a bad batch these are awesome i have ordered them three times now and each time they have been soft tasty and easily slide out of the bags i sincerely think you got a bum pack i have tried a couple of other flavors too but prefer this one over the others the cookies are healthy and fast and most of all taste great

years ago on one of the shopping networks on tv quality value and convenience the company was doing bus tours where they discovered entrepreneurs with new and innovative products to sell and they helped them to establish themselves and their products in the marketplace a great service i wish this company would do again br anyway there was one lady entrepreneur whose product happened to be a healthy breakfast cookie such as this br i think perhaps it could have been erin baker i could not verify this br i know at the time i purchased several quantities of this lady cookies do not remember the variety and was very pleased with them br then the product was no longer available i was able to get them for awhile at retail store about miles from me and they were costlier than on tv so stopped purchasing them br time went by and my husband requested an item like this to pack in his lunch box for work as well as my teenage son requesting the same for before school in the mornings br after googling breakfast cookie with thought of making them myself from a recipe i found erin baker on amazon and it was like finding an old friend br still have not made at home my own cookies but i will when time allows br for the time being as long as i can get them on amazon for a decent price i will continue to do so it is nice to have several varieties when available br though i see some of the reviews do not rave about this item as much as i have here personally for what they are i do not hesitate to recommend them and our family enjoys them in moderation

i eat a cookie every morning for breakfast different kinds i do not get hungry until later in the afternoon i have lost pounds in the last month because i am not overeating trash all day i am not saying it is the cookies that are all responsible but i eat the cookie and i am full then can think about what i would like for lunch instead of just eating
erin baker breakfast cookies are the greatest i ordered morning glory as one of the flavors last time and they are very good my favorite is the banana walnut and i rate them as excellent

there are way too many flavors going on in this breakfast cookie at least for my tastebuds whomever was in charge of adding spices really went too far to the point that it is actually nauseating obviously i will not be ordering this one again
i eat these cookies frequently using the subscribe method the nutrition provided is high quality br i recommend all the erin cookies for a snack or meal
it is just okay to me this product flavor does not impress me as much as the vegan choc chunk ones offered by erin

i am surprised by how good this breakfast cookie flavor is it has depth of spices and textures and is truly delicious br br calories seemed a bit high but i ate one with a large glass of water and it has been hours and my tummy is not growling yet i even worked out too br br i love that it does not have any freaky ingredients and it was very soft and moist i gave a little pinch of it to my toddler daughter and she enjoyed it too i prefer to have actual oatmeal in the morning with fruit and yogurt but these breakfast cookies are great if the morning goes sideways and i do not have time or opportunity to fix something br br the problem i found with other protein bars and such is that in about hours i was feeling peckish and looking for snacks until lunch i did not have that problem with this breakfast cookie it may have more calories than i thought i wanted to spend but it is very worth it since it keeps me out of the kitchen until lunchtime br br another nice thing there are not any chips or icing on this cookie to melt in the mid day heat so you can keep one of these in the purse or diaper bag without creating a big mess for yourself later br br i keep them in the freezer for freshness they are really moist and chewy once you let them thaw or microwave i put one on a saucer and nuke for seconds from frozen solid it turns out like its warm from the oven i do not recommend keeping them in the fridge baked goods and bread will get dried out if kept there br br update i have lost pounds in the last year with very minimal changes and these cookies have helped me go from not eating breakfast and snacking all morning to eating breakfast no matter how busy and not needing to snack or eat until lunchtime they are very filling and are perfect for when you do not have time to make anything
Summary: wow this tastes great and have lost weight

Text: ironically i am an amazon seasonal worker i discovered these tasty treats while working on the sales floor i kept thinking wow i sure ship alot of these things what are they so i went home and checked them out on line for myself i am a very active and healthy person i am always looking for wholesome breakfast options i have a hard time eating in the am these cookies are so filling and delish i eat one at around am and i am fine until lunch healthy ingredients to fuel your busy day lifestyle i cannot wait to put them in my back pack when i go hiking next
this is another great breakfasr cookie from erin would definately buy again great to carry when you must skip a meal
honestly with the amount of sugar in these they are not much better than eating a calorie regular cookie i do not think these are that healthy the cookies taste fine but i will not repurchase
this is one badass cookie i got these on sale at amazon warehouse good deal otherwise it is a good expensive cookie what else can i say grab some

so far have tried two flavors this and oat raisins and prefer the other better this flavor tastes a little bland compared to the other for some reason even though it has more ingredients but it is not inedible or anything just a little bland br br as for whether it helps you feel full i would say it does not for me cause it is just a oz size afterall and i am used to eating a lot more but i always skip breakfast so eating this is better than nothing considering studies show breakfast is the most important meal of the day eating breakfast also helps you lose weight and raise metabolism br br i d give the taste stars but bought it for amazing cents each cookie so price gets stars which avg out to stars
Summary: taste stars price stars so stars

Text: i enjoy several varieties of the erin baker breakfast cookies banana nut pumpkin spice but this is my favorite not too sweet for my taste very satisfying and filling i heat in microwave for about seconds and good to go great with coffee or tea i keep them in the freezer as they recommend you must do this as they can get mold otherwise and they always taste fresh and fine to me they are wrapped packaged very nicely for the freezer also good in the toaster crispy crust br br these are one of my favorite quick breakfasts on hurried mornings and sometimes i even enjoy them on a relaxed sunday morning i buy these regularly and quality has remained consistently good i recommend these highly
Summary: delicious and satisfying my favorite flavor in their line

Text: the breakfast cookie is excellent my grandson came back from a scouting trip and said it was better than the energy bars they were given to eat nice blend for any time of day i pop mine from the freezer into the microwave for about seconds taste best warm

i knew before buying that the ingredients were not all that wholesome evaporated cane juice enriched wheat flour what are those doing in a breakfast if a product is claiming to be a healthy breakfast it should really have unadulterated ingredients i ll give the erin baker brand its due for using aluminum free baking powder all that having been said if you regard this as a cookie rather than a meal replacement you will be happy with it it is healthy for a cookie tastes decent and fantastically convenient take it out of the freezer in the morning and it is good to go in hours without heating but despite what other reviewers have said it is a high calorie snack at best i am a lb female and this barely held me over for about and a half hours before i was starving again if you are someone with a small appetite try packing it with a piece of fruit bottom line it is a healthy cookie not breakfast much less a healthy breakfast
Summary: convenient food but it is really a cookie not a meal replacement

Text: slightly biased because this company was started near my hometown but i have been a fan of erin baker breakfast cookies for years since i first noticed them popping up at coffee shops back home now living on the other side of the country i was pleasantly surprised to find them on amazon and even more excited to find them at such a great price store them in the freezer pop them in the toaster and it is like eating a fresh baked cookie that is full of good things for you and keeps you from getting hungry till lunch high in fiber and much better tasting than any energy bar out there who does not love a cookie for breakfast i love these things will be ordering more soon to keep our freezer well stocked
Summary: great option for a quick healthy filling breakfast on the go

Text: erin cookies are the awesome great for an on the run family when there is no time for a longer breakfast i keep them on hand at all times for my kids so they can grab one when they go out the door to school or work i even keep two in my car console for those moments when i need some fast nutrition while driving tasty good for you and quick as an active family what more could we want

these are very good i like several of the flavors of these cookie and usually have one a few times per week very convenient to eat in the car while taking my daughter to school product is wholesome too so you can feel good about eating them i order frequently and hope amazon continues to carry them

the three ounce breakfast cookies are a small meal in a cookie and the individually wrapped cookies are easy to keep in a desk drawer or to carry in a back pack or briefcase they are good for people on the go and have reasonably balanced nutrition grams of protein grams of fiber grams of fat they are listed as having calories they have an expiration date noted on the wrapper i have tried many different flavors over many years and have never found a flavor i did not like the listing of ingredients is in white lettering on an orange background on the wrapper and is almost impossible to read but the ingredients can be obtained from the web page the morning glory cookies have a good combination it is worth sampling the different cookie flavors and you will undoubtedly have favorites

this made an excellent mother day gift my mom with discriminating taste is truly enjoying them they have just the right amount of small sweetness for breakfast and a flavor she likes the packaging makes them good for a mail order gift

i first purchased erin baker breakfast cookie in the caramel apple flavor while it was tasty and very fulfilling i was not forsure if i was in love with them and really why waste your time eating something you do not love so based on customer reviews i then tried the morning glory breakfast cookie i loved the bits of nut and i have to say it is tasty and fulfilling it is my nd favorite cookie and i easily give them a star rating br br i again began browsing the cookie flavors and spent time reading customer reviews and decided to try the peanut butter chocolate chunk and all i can say is third times the charm these breakfast cookies are knock your socks off delicious i plan on stocking up so that i do not have to order over the hot summer months as i have read on some of the cookie reviews that because these cookies are so fresh and have no preservatives to prevent spoilage that they are prone to mold if left out to long so i figure why take the chance i am just going to make several purchases before summer gets here br br i totally recommend these breakfast cookies my only wish is that they came in a variety box so one is not forced to purchase a whole pack to sample one flavor yes they are a little high calorie so you might not want to use them as a snack but for a meal replacement they are fantastic i love the natural ingredients and i know these cookies are fresh makes you wonder how fresh those meal replacement bars are that sit on the store shelf for months

super good cookie for breakfast they surprisingly fill me up for a couple of hours which for me is wonderful i insist on eating as soon as i wake up in the morning and this is a great way to get some whole grains and healthy stuff on the run br br perishable which makes me happy so do not stock up unless you have room in the freezer i keep mine in the refrigerator and so far no problems br br my son likes them too
i love erin breakfast cookies but this flavor is a little to rich for me it gives me that funny feeling in the back of my throat

this is my first erin baker breakfast cookie experience i put all the cookies in the freezer upon arrival i followed the supplied helpful hint to toast the cookies on the darkest setting memories of my grandmother winter cookies warm from the oven commenced tasty toasty outside and warm soft inside these are yummy with a tall glass of the coldest milk or a hot coffee to go i would buy these again
these cookies are tasty but just a little too gooey and the calorie count is for one cookie this is a bit high
these are not grandma cookies but tasty enough when eating healthy is what you try to do

i was so excited to try these i am trying to find economical good for you food i ate one of these and a cup of joe and i was full delicious heated it seconds that of course is unfrozen i immediately froze the rest to keep them fresh as no preservatives in them i think you have to heat it about seconds when frozen my son had one he is and he had to have two to fill him he likes them a lot my mom had one and she was full she could not quit talking about how good they are another reason i also wanted to try these is because my mom has alzheimers and cannot cook on stove safely anymore she likes to snack and get things herself so these are perfect she can still use the microwave i feel these are healthy eating and that makes me feel good we all have medical disabilities so the easier the better the really cool part is that they are just a little over a each for breakfast we love the morning glory and am fixing to order more with amazon prime by the way for those of you who do not know about prime it is wonderful and we have saved so much on shipping this year also it is quick day free shipping and for overnight i try to only buy products that have prime on them our cookies came today a saturday with prime day by fed ex that is another thing i love is shipping is free with prime on these if you shop a lot on amazon which i am doing more and more the is a great value for a years membership gotta order more cookies now blessings br br update i have read comments that some people had these get mould on them please remember to freeze these as they have no preservatives there is a note on white paper from erin baker in each package which suggests you do this and why just hate to see erin get bashed for this when it is not her fault mine go in the freezer as soon as they arrive that way they are always fresh still love these cookies br br i am now on monthly automatic mailing so we have them even if i forget to order on time that way it is even less expensive how can you go wrong great bargain for those of us who have to watch our pennies br br my mom who has alzheimers loves them so much i hate to think what would happen if i quit ordering them she talks about them all the time she was feeling so down as she cannot cook much at all anymore and since these they are easy for her to heat in the microwave it makes her feel better about herself thank you erin
Summary: first time buy and we love them

Text: another great product delicious and nutritious it makes you feel guilty that you are eating something that is actually good and good for you

i purchased these with high hopes because i do not seem to have enough time to eat a great breakfast but i thought this would provide sustenance til lunchtime however i was disappointed after a few bites while the cookie is wholesome and filling it does have a slight aftertaste to me it seemed like something was missing not sure what since there are many good ingredients but i think i would have enjoyed apple cinnamon much better br br also i also found it disturbing that even though my cookies were not frozen probably should have done this since they are a moist cookie and not yet expired january they were stored on the pantry shelf as they are individually wrapped but they became moldy yep i just threw away three cookies because i could see mold through the package opened one to confirm it yuck
very good flavor and texture excellent wholesome snack one of the best all natural oatmeal cookies i have ever tried plus all natural ingredients
i especially like the chocolate cookie but failed to freeze my cookies on the third day i had three molded cookies word of advice put in the freezer within the first day or two

breakfast is often a hard meal to fit in and this is a great way to get the fuel that you need in this important meal tasty even better after seconds in a microwave we are about to reorder these are a hit
gave erin baker breakfast morning glory cookies as a gift and the recipient gave the cookies very high reviews thank you

i love the mix of flavors in this cookie the cookies are very moist and they are also very filling the only thing i did not like about these is the strong nutmeg taste unfortunately nutmeg is not my favorite spice i would have enjoyed more raisins but my kids are glad there are not that many i love the fact that i can keep these handy for mornings when we are running late and for when we take trips they are easy to freeze and seem to keep rather well in the freezer
i love this breakfast cookie i usually have this with fruit and tea or juice for a quick breakfast or sometimes i have it with vanilla ice cream for dessert
i love these cookies they are just perfect for an on the go breakfast bite paired with a piece of fruit
these cookies have good taste ar a great quick breakfast and are healthy i will have one with a cup of coffee and i am good for the morning

if i had not scored these during a warehouse sell off i would even more seriously fail to understand how or why anyone could justify paying over a dollar a piece for these things sure the instructions are dead on with the freeze before toasting method but they have more ingredients than healthy cookies i can make at home for much cheaper and with superior texture and without the garbage if you think these are healthy or a good value you have been duped
Summary: even the i spent on these was a mistake

Text: i really wanted to like these but i just found them to be to sweet sugary br i generally stay away from cliff bars for the same reason and had hoped that these would be as good as they sound br br sadly its just to sweet tasting for me br br special note the packs i received oct have g sugar not the g listed in the amazon nutrition section br there may have been a recipe change
the cookies tasted too much like baby food prunes to be any good also they included directions to freeze them when they arrived to keep them from spoiling i would never buy these again
not kosher ignore the symbol they are not kosher and not certified by any company i contacted the company to confirm

we picked these up based on the glowing reviews my fault my mistake i believe they are way over rated does not taste morning glory at all instead tastes just like any one of the other in the line dry stale dense oatmeal cookie like a cookie experiment gone bad by a pre teen br br in addition cookies arrived cracked broken and sticking to bag yet are dry stale inside what a waste i would have never purchased these in a b m store had i had an opportunity to examine them first
Summary: bought based on reviews no more

Text: the breakfast cookie is not to my liking and i do not think i will order them in the future

after purchasing a href http www amazon com gp product b viwuhg kopali goldenberries a i tried a few other kopali snacks a href http www amazon com gp product b vircz chocolate covered cacao nibs a and a href http www amazon com gp product b viwute chocolate covered banana a br br the goldenberries are the best dried fruit i have ever had they are bursts of sweet and tangy flavor and achieve the same satisfaction as sour gummies grown in columbia goldenberries are high in antioxidants bioflavonoids fiber and even contain protein they are a great snack and are somewhat filling br br the dark chocolate covered nibs are also good the small package contains a lot more nibs than it seems at first the nibs are crunchy high in antioxidants and a little bit bitter but the dark chocolate balances the bitterness nicely br br the chocolate covered bananas were also delicious i expected them to be crispy but instead they were chewy and a bit zesty each of the kopali organics products is a healthy and satisfying snack you should try them especially the goldenberries

if it was not for me standing in the checkout line at whole foods i would have never even noticed the bag i decided to try it out and omg they are the best i love that the chocolate is not an overwhelming sweetness but just enough to compliment the dried bananas i honestly cannot wait to get my hands on another bag the only disappointment that i have is that you cannot buy them at every whole foods
Summary: i am so hooked on these

Text: kopali chocolate covered bananas are amazing the bananas are naturally sun dried so they are chewy which makes them different from most chocolate covered bananas and the chocolate is vegan gluten free and fair trade i could not ask for anything more in a food product i also love putting these on top of vanilla ice cream as a nice alternative to more unhealthy toppings nice work kopali

love these buy them at whole foods all the time healthy pure organic and fair trade dark chocolate with yummy banana all the chocolates and fruits are good but these are my favorite helping the environment and small farmers all over the world too a href http www amazon com gp product b viwute kopali organics organic chocolate covered dried banana ounce pouch pack of a

this is the best snack on the planet every little molecule of this item is vibrating with the love that comes from growing harvesting making and distributing it in harmony with nature it is soooo good people think that just because it costs a little more than a bag of monocultured corn chips it is expensive but in terms of the taste of the nutrition of the total value it is not expensive it is not cheap but nothing green is or should be

these bite sized banana pieces are delicious they are covered in dark chocolate and are chewy the bananas are not fried or crispy and banana chips typically are these chocolate covered bananas are vegan organic and fair trade and while they are a bit pricey the bags are small and will not last too long because these are delicious they are a unique treat which makes it worth purchasing these are not too sweet they have a hint of sweetness from the chocolate and banana but are a tad bitter from the dark chocolate

i love kopali stuff great little snacks that are always fresh when i buy em and good for the earth save the planet thanks kopali br br a href http www amazon com gp product b viwute kopali organics organic chocolate covered dried banana ounce pouch pack of a a href http www amazon com gp product b viwv kopali organics organic chocolate covered mulberries ounce pouch pack of a

Text: i was disappointed by my first taste of kopali organics chocolate covered dried banana the chocolate is waxy and the bananas too soft for me i was expecting more crunch a drier banana the banana did not taste of banana to me either i will not purchase again
it clearly states on the description pack of but i only got and i cannot find how to complain about this i do not want to return

i bought these walnuts hoping they would have a fresh natural taste better than the packaged nuts i find at my local grocery unfortunately the nuts i received had somehow absorbed a strong taste of plastic i took them out of the plastic tubs they were packed in and put them in another container i use that does not transfer odors or tastes onto the food even so after several weeks these nuts still tasted very unpleasantly of plastic

i do not buy my walnuts anywhere else these taste great and are a fantastic price i put most of them in the freezer and pull them out as i need them in order to ensure they stay fresh since tubs lasts me quite a while
Summary: great product at a great price

Text: i purchased this product from otto because the offering via amazon prime was out of stock otto shipped me four plain tubs without terrafina labels and sealed with a vertical x of clear packing tape rather than terrafina vacuum seal where the tub and the cover meet i called otto within a few days of receipt and they said they buy in bulk from terrafina and package it themselves they said they were out of terrafina labels two of the tubs developed mold within a few days of my call to otto and i had to throw all of them out i am now seeking a refund from amazon
i get these nuts for my church sister who does not have a computer she actually eats them every day which is included in her diet

i think depeche mode said it the best i just cannot get enough and that is how i feel about these crackers they have a wonderful flavor and are low in fat and calories a serving size is crackers these are a great alternative to basic potato chips macaroni salad and or french fries great by themselves with dip or along your favorite sandwich once you open a package you will be amazed how long before you are opening another
Summary: you cannot eat just one package

Text: great flavor and love the snap when your looking for something crunchy that is not high in calories a litle high in carbs though these are amazing and you can have crackers in a serving i was buying them at an natural health food store for a package a much better deal for a case here on amazon about less per package

sesmark makes a very high quality rice cracker and then proceeds to ruin it by loading it up with so much salt as to make it inedible use caution before buying this item since there are no returns and you might find yourself with a throw away
my entire family loves these crackers great with cheese delicious alone too
these crackers are great too again especialy for people who cannot tolerate wheat others like them too they stay crunchy you save money buying by the case
these crackers are very addictive the flavor is superb and the crunch is great

these are great crackers they have a great crunch when you bite into them and they are loaded with a wonderful toasted sesame flavor my husband has diabetes and we went out looking for snacks for him to eat these have no trans fat and crackers is one serving if you need to watch your intake of fat and calories for whatever reason you know how hard it is to find snacks that are satisfying and these are just great
if you are gluten free and want crackers this is the one for you it is also delicious this is my second order of these

and that is part of the problem no really i can eat just a few maybe more later br these thins are not quite as thin as i would prefer nor am i but make a good snack for hors d oeuvres if you top them with anything moist do a few at a time they get soggy pretty fast

Text: i buy these crackers because i need something gluten free to snack with but why does gluten free have to be so salty i have to wipe the salt off to be able to eat them wish the manufacturers would learn that just because we are glten free does not mean we can eat all that salt less salt please

i like these sesame rice thins because they are just the thing i need to fill between meals especially with a bit of cheese philly cheese tasty spread and other great to have separated packages because i go through one so quickly and my husband loves to munch on these all the time i recommend these to anyone who wants a different type of snack for a party or just for one self

these are great seriously they kind of remind me of corn nuts they are crunchy light a tiny bit salty and totally tasty i just got them today and cannot stop eating them i very much suggest getting these pretty good price and so much better than the rice crackers at my local store

sesame rice thins are the best tasting rice crackers i have tried and i have tried several they stay crispy and crunchy and come in several flavors you will not be disappointed amazon has the best price too

the product is a known value to us and is fresh the physical condition of the product leaves something to be desired the individual wafers are often broken up to the extent of of the contents of the package this indicates careless packing for the rigors of package shipment the use of a somewhat larger outside box with the air bag padding on all sides should be better for the physical care of the contents my wife eats the thins for lunch very often with meat cheese or fish and finds the broken ones unsatisfactory
these are my favorite gluten free crackers and they come in many flavors i have tried and liked most of them
crispy with the light flavor of rice and sesame lightly salted i love these crackers
as good as any in grocery stores and more reasonably priced but you do have to get a carton of them
i have to eat a gluten free diet and these crackers are the best i have come across i eat them with cheese or hummus very good
Summary: awesome wheat free alternative to crackers

Text: there is no other brand is comparable to this brand whoever i gave the crackers to would become addicted i keep order them over and over again

i ordered cases as always rvc d the cases and the crackers were saltless tastless amazon was kind to send more cases and they were the same blah i have written the masnufacturer to let them know br amazon has greta customer care

i added this to my order since i was going to be paying shipping charges anyway i did not expect anything unusual there probably are as many jerk recipes as there are residents in jamaica but this one surprised me pleasantly it was not full of sugar and added a really pleasant note to everything i cooked with it i will be buying it again

when chatchi favorite afternoon treat became mysteriously unavailable in the vending machine at work chatchi panicked how would chatchi get through the work day without his chuckles the delicious fat free candy that provides you with the sweet filled enjoyment you earn every day br br fortunately amazon carries this delicious chewy fruity candy and chatchi can get back to doing his job br br chatchi only complaint about chuckles is the black licorice flavor chatchi normally likes black licorice but this flavor is so overpowering chatchi needs to eat it last so as not to ruin the remaining cherry orange lemon and lime flavors br br chatchi loves chuckles

when i was young nearly a half century ago chuckles was a very popular candy i really enjoyed eating these jellied treats which were dusted with granulated sugar as they definitely satisfied a sweet tooth i still enjoy them on occasion though they are not as easy to find as in the old days having waned somewhat in popularity my particular favorite was the cherry flavor if they had sold an all cherry pack i would have bought them by the ton luckily for me an all cherry pack was not available i also enjoyed the licorice and orange flavors lemon and lime however were the flavors that i liked least so i would benevolently offer them to my younger sisters i was all heart in those days

you are crazy if you do not have a soft spot for chuckles you know darn well that they were one of your favorites as a kid and you cannot resist a package or two even today i love the cherry flavored and wish that they would introduce a red only package of chuckles if only for a limited edition and boy would i hold on to a few of those for posterity a tip for you chuckles lovers freeze em they last a lot longer that way and are well complimented by your favorite non caloric beverage we ladies need to watch our expanding figures unless the stork is on the way god bless chuckles

i looked around a lot for a non water drink to have on a diet and it was a long gross search this really fit the bill though good taste very light and did not taste fake at all br br my advice though is per packet disregard their instructions use an entire pitcher of water for one packet or it is just way too potent
these bars are great however this item can be purchased for at sams club same box
these taste terrific and my grandkids call them candy bars and consider them a special treat they prefer the chocolate chip i love the dark chocolate almond

super bubble is my very favorite gum and very hard to find here the box i received was a real hit or miss more than half the gum was brick hard totally unchewable i have never run across this issue with this product and am very disappointed i will take a chance and buy it again sometime in the future but this particular purchase left a bad taste in my mouth

for the longest time they would not ship this to apos i do not know why maybe they were afraid the yummy super bubble gum would fall into the hands of the enemy get flavor and one piece works i chew gum every day in the gym because i grind my teeth when lifting helps alot
i have purchaesed twice so far and in both boxes the gum was really hard product is great but i would not purchase again through amazon due to it being so hard to chew
Summary: super bubble is great but box from amazon not that great

Text: i am addicted to super bubble bubble gum i ordered four boxes and was very pleased with the promptness packaging and product
Summary: prompt service fresh and delicious product

Text: i ordered this saffron after looking at seller feedback and assumed that since this is expensive it will be premium quality br but only after i put it in water for sometime then the color of the flakes changed and i realized that its a fake one br dont waste your time on this

i ordered this product because i love pasta but need to start modifying my diet because i want to start fighting competitively again and need to get myself back to peak performance i was skeptical from all the talk of fishy smell and taste thus being the reason i ordered the single pack i prepared them as instructed and prepared them into a soup i used chicken breasts cut into strips boiled them into a broth with sliced carrots green onions and broccoli and then poured it into the bowl over the noodles me and my girlfriend tried it and it turned out great she put some soy sauce in hers because she liked it better that way but we both loved it it did not have the fish smell after rinsing nor while eating it the texture is comparable to the rice noodles you find in vietnamese and japanese dishes i am a convert to miracle noodle i fed two people off of one pack not bad i say also noticed the difference in the curving of my snack urges didn t even touch my yogurt orange or nature valley peanut butter bar until near the end of my shift at work and could wait longer before i took my lunch at work i work hour night shifts so that is why i ate this before work these are a great tool into any nutrition plan in my book
Summary: great product and no problems with delivery
